scene_description: [Cut to behind the gang looking down at Joo Dee.]

character_words: A month?
Six to eight weeks, actually.
Six to eight weeks, actually.
Isn't it nice? I think you'll really enjoy it here.
I think we would enjoy it more if we weren't staying for so long. Can't we see the Earth King any sooner?
scene_description: [Cut to view of entire room from the back.]

character_words: The Earth King is very busy running the finest city in the world!  But he will see you as soon as time permits.
The Earth King is very busy running the finest city in the world!  But he will see you as soon as time permits.
scene_description: [Close-up on Sokka, as an annoyed expression covers his face.]

character_words: If we're going to be here for a month, we should spend our time looking for Appa.
scene_description: [Cut to Momo and Aang. Aang turns to look out the window determined.]

character_words: If we're going to be here for a month, we should spend our time looking for Appa.
scene_description: [At the sound of Appa's name, Momo wakes up.]

character_words: I'd like to escort you anywhere you'd like to go.
scene_description: [Side-view of Aang with Joo Dee behind. Bows.]

character_words: We don't need a babysitter.
Oh, I won't get in the way.  And to leave you alone would make me a bad host!  Where shall we start?
scene_description: [She takes a step, blocking Toph's path.]

character_words: Oh, I won't get in the way.  And to leave you alone would make me a bad host!  Where shall we start?
scene_description: [Close-up of Toph, from behind, with Joo Dee in front.]

character_words: I'm sorry, but I haven't heard anything about a flying bison. I didn't even know there were any.
If someone wanted to sell a stolen animal without anyone knowing, where would they go‌?
scene_description: [Cut to shot of Aang and Sokka, Joo Dee lurking behind.]

character_words: Where's the black market? Who runs it?  Come on, you know!
Where's the black market? Who runs it?  Come on, you know!
Uh ...  That would be illegal. You'll have to leave now; your lemur is harassing my sparrowkeets.
Uh ...  That would be illegal. You'll have to leave now; your lemur is harassing my sparrowkeets.
scene_description: [Looks at Joo Dee, who is standing behind Sokka and Aang, shaking her head.]

character_words: Hmm ... I've never seen any sandbenders or nomads around here.  You should ask Professor Zei, he teaches the class on desert cultures.
Right. And which of your professors could we ask about the war with the Fire Nation?
Uh ...
I don't know. I'm not a political science student ... I've got to get to class.
Well, I'm sorry no one has seen your bison. Why don't you go get some rest‌?  Someone will be over with dinner, later.
Hey, come with me.
scene_description: [He gestures to the rest of Team Avatar to follow him.]

character_words: You're the Avatar!  I heard you were in town.  I'm Pong.
You're the Avatar!  I heard you were in town.  I'm Pong.
Nice to meet you, Pong.
So, Pong, what's goin' on with this city? Why is everyone here so scared here to talk about the war?
War? Scared? What do you mean?
scene_description: [Frontal view. Shifts his eyes to the sides.]

character_words: I can feel you shaking.
Look, I'm just a minor government official.  I've waited three years to get this house. I don't want go get into trouble.
Look, I'm just a minor government official.  I've waited three years to get this house. I don't want go get into trouble.
scene_description: [Looks to the sides to confirm that no one is present except them.]

character_words: Get in trouble with who?!
scene_description: [Tight side-view of the gang and Pong.]

character_words: Shh, listen, you can't mention the War here.  And whatever you do, stay away from the Dai Li.
scene_description: [Puts his finger on his mouth, and whispers.]

character_words: Shh, listen, you can't mention the War here.  And whatever you do, stay away from the Dai Li.
Would you like a pot of tea?
We've been working in a tea shop all day!  I'm sick of tea!
We've been working in a tea shop all day!  I'm sick of tea!
scene_description: [View from the outside in to the window where Zuko lays on a bed.]

character_words: "Sick of tea?" That's like being sick of breathing!  Have you seen the spark rocks to heat up the water?
scene_description: [Pan across to Iroh through another window.]

character_words: "Sick of tea?" That's like being sick of breathing!  Have you seen the spark rocks to heat up the water?
scene_description: [He rummages through the cupboard beneath the counter, where he is standing. Close-up view of kettle.]

character_words: They're not there.  You'll have to firebend, old man.  Where're you going?
They're not there.  You'll have to firebend, old man.  Where're you going?
scene_description: [Opens his fist to show some emerald colored rocks. Close-up side-view.]

character_words: They're not there.  You'll have to firebend, old man.  Where're you going?
scene_description: [He sees Iroh going inside, and narrows his eyes.]

character_words: I borrowed our neighbors'. Such kind people.
scene_description: [View through window. Coming back to the counter.]

character_words: I got it! I know how we're going to see the Earth King!
How are we supposed to do that?  "One doesn't just pop in on the Earth King!"
How are we supposed to do that?  "One doesn't just pop in on the Earth King!"
The king is having a party at the palace tonight for his pet bear.
scene_description: [Side-view of her and Aang. Reading from the papers.]

character_words: You mean, platypus bear?
No, it just says 'bear'.
Certainly you mean his pet skunk bear.
scene_description: [Close-up view. He is lying upside down.]

character_words: Or his armadillo bear.
Gopher bear?
Just ... bear.
This place ... is weird.
The palace will be packed. We can sneak in with the crowd!
Won't work.
Why not?
Well, no offense to you simple country folk, but a real society crowd will spot you a mile away. You've got no manners!
Well, no offense to you simple country folk, but a real society crowd will spot you a mile away. You've got no manners!
scene_description: [Takes a pastry from a bowl and eats it.]

character_words: Excuse me? I've got no manners?! You're not exactly "lady fancy fingers!"
I learned proper society behavior and chose to leave it.  You never learned anything. And frankly, it's a little too late.
I learned proper society behavior and chose to leave it.  You never learned anything. And frankly, it's a little too late.
scene_description: [Throws the half eaten pastry to the side.]

character_words: I learned proper society behavior and chose to leave it.  You never learned anything. And frankly, it's a little too late.
scene_description: [She picks her nose and flicks the snot off her finger.]

character_words: Aha, but you learned it! You could teach us!
Yeah, I'm mastering every element. How hard could manners be‌?
Good evening, Mr. Sokka Water Tribe, Ms. Katara Water Tribe, Lord Momo of the Momo Dynasty. Your Momo-ness.
scene_description: [Frontal view of Momo as he peeks at Aang from under the carpet and slightly bows.]

character_words: Avatar Aang, how do you do? Go on.
scene_description: [Stands up also wearing a curtain like a robe. Mimicking a typical high class person.]

character_words: Katara might be able to pull it off, but you two would be lucky to pass as busboys!
But I feel so fancy!
Earth!
Fire!
Wow, you look beautiful.
Don't talk to the commoners, Katara. First rule of society.
We'll get in the party, and then find a way to let you in through the side gate.
Jet, we need to talk.
What‌? Oh great, it's you guys. Where have you been‌?  I could use some help with surveillance here!
We've been talking,  and we think you're becoming obsessed with this. It's not healthy.
scene_description: [Cut to side-view of the threesome, tea shop in background.]

character_words: Oh, really? You both think this?
We came here to make a fresh start. But you won't let this go. Even though there is no real proof!
Well, maybe if you'd help me!
Jet, you gotta stop this.

Maybe you've forgotten why we need to start over.  Maybe you've forgotten about how the Fire Nation left us all homeless‌. How they wiped out all the people we loved. If you don't want to help me, I'll get the evidence on my own.
scene_description: [View of Longshot and Smellerbee from behind Jet. Longshot and Smellerbee look down, guiltily.]

character_words: Maybe you've forgotten why we need to start over.  Maybe you've forgotten about how the Fire Nation left us all homeless‌. How they wiped out all the people we loved. If you don't want to help me, I'll get the evidence on my own.
This is the best tea in the city!
The secret ingredient is love.
The secret ingredient is love.
scene_description: [He waves a hand through the steam coming from the teapot and walks toward the back of the shop where the owner is, while Zuko gives him a disgusted look.]

character_words: I think you're due for a raise.
I'm tired of waiting!  These two men are firebenders!
scene_description: [Pointing an accusing finger at Iroh and Zuko.]

character_words: I know they're firebenders, I saw the old man heating his tea!
He works in a tea shop.
He's a firebender! I'm telling you!
Drop your swords, boy. Nice and easy.
scene_description: [Frontal view. Stands up, along with another man.]

character_words: You'll have to defend yourself. Then everyone will know. Go ahead, show them what you can do.
You want a show? I'll give you a show!
Invitation please.
I think this will do.
No entry without an invitation. Step out of line, please.
Look, the Pangs and the Yum Soon Hans are waiting in there for us! I'm going to have to tell them who didn't let me in.
Step out of line please.
Sir, I'm sorry to bother you, but my cousin lost our invitations.  She's blind.  Do you think you could help us? Our family's inside and I'm sure they're very worried.
Sir, I'm sorry to bother you, but my cousin lost our invitations.  She's blind.  Do you think you could help us? Our family's inside and I'm sure they're very worried.
Sir, I'm sorry to bother you, but my cousin lost our invitations.  She's blind.  Do you think you could help us? Our family's inside and I'm sure they're very worried.
I am honored, please come with me.
scene_description: [Close-up view as he smiles and bows his head.]

character_words: He's taking all the good stuff!
Quiet! You don't know what I had to do to get seats this near the bear!
It's beautiful, isn't it?  By the way, I'm Long Feng. I'm a cultural minister to the king.
I'm Kwa Mai, and this is ... Dum.  Ow!
I'm Kwa Mai, and this is ... Dum.  Ow!
scene_description: [Toph frowns and pulls a string hanging from Katara's headdress, causing her pain.]

character_words: Now where is your family? I'd love to meet them.
Uh ... I don't see them right now, but I'm sure we'll find them soon.  Thanks for all your help.
Uh ... I don't see them right now, but I'm sure we'll find them soon.  Thanks for all your help.
Don't worry, as your escort it would be dishonorable to abandon you ladies without finding your family first. We'll keep looking.
scene_description: [He turns around and leads the two girls, while Katara glances at Toph, nervously.]

character_words: Where are they?
Look, I came up with a back-up plan.  We dress Momo like a ghost, okay?  He flies by the guards, creating a distraction. Then, we blast a hole in the wall-
Look, I came up with a back-up plan.  We dress Momo like a ghost, okay?  He flies by the guards, creating a distraction. Then, we blast a hole in the wall-
Or we could go in as these guys. Toph said we might pass as busboys!
Okay ...  But remember that Momo ghost plan. I think it's a winner.
Okay ...  But remember that Momo ghost plan. I think it's a winner.
scene_description: [Smiling, he and Aang sink behind the pedestal.]

character_words: You must be getting tired of using those swords.  Why don't you go ahead and firebend at me?
You must be getting tired of using those swords.  Why don't you go ahead and firebend at me?
scene_description: [Close-up shot of Zuko with a look of annoyance.]

character_words: Please, son, you're confused! You don't know what you're doing!
Bet you wish he'd help you out with a little fire blast right now.
You're the one who needs help.
You see that‌?!  The Fire Nation is trying to silence me.  It'll never happen.
You see that‌?!  The Fire Nation is trying to silence me.  It'll never happen.
Where are Toph and Katara?
Forget about them! Just keep an eye out for the king.
scene_description: [He grows slightly annoyed as Momo's tail, which has been sticking out of Aang's hat, begins to wag in his face.]

character_words: I don't know what he looks like.
You know, royal, flowing robe, fancy jewelry.
scene_description: [He grabs Momo's tail, still wagging in his face, and vigorously stuffs it back into Aang's hat.]

character_words: That could be anyone!
Another crab puff, please.
scene_description: [Trying to speak in a fancy voice.]

character_words: Another crab puff, please.
scene_description: [Sokka leans in, eyes closed, with his tray to hand her a puff, unaware it's her.]

character_words: You found us!
I'd know your little footsteps anywhere, Twinkle Toes.
Thanks for letting us in!
scene_description: [Opening his eyes, realizing who they are. Sarcastically.]

character_words: Sorry, but the guy who escorted us in won't let us out of his sight!
What guy?
scene_description: [Slightly confused, not seeing anyone following them.]

character_words: What are you doing here? You have to leave immediately, or we will be in terrible trouble!
Not until we see the king.
You don't understand. You must go.
Aarrrh! Oh!
Sorry. No, don't shout.
The Avatar! I didn't know the Avatar would be here.
You keep their attention while I look for the king.
Watch this, everybody!
Drop your weapons.
Arrest them,  they're firebenders!
This poor boy is confused, we're just simple refugees.
scene_description: [Panning view from behind Jet facing Iroh and Zuko.]

character_words: This young man wrecked my tea shop, and assaulted my employees!
It's true sir, we saw the whole thing. This crazy kid attacked the finest tea maker in the city.
Oh, ho, ho. That's very sweet.
Come with us, son.
You don't understand! They're Fire Nation! You have to believe me!
Aang! The Earth King!
Greetings, Your Majesty.
Hey, let me go!
Avatar, it is a great honor to meet you.  I am Long Feng, Grand Secretariat of Ba Sing Se and head of the Dai Li. I'd like to talk to you. Your friends will be waiting for us in the library.
Why won't you let us talk to the king? We have information that could defeat the Fire Nation!
The Earth King has no time to get involved with political squabbles and the day to day minutia of military activities.
This could be the most important thing he's ever heard.

What's most important to his royal majesty is maintaining the cultural heritage of Ba Sing Se. All his duties relate to issuing decrees on such matters. It's my job to oversee the rest of the city's resources, including the military.
So the king is just a figurehead.
He's your puppet!
Oh, no, no. His Majesty is an icon, a god to his people. He can't sully his hands with the hourly change of an endless war.
But we found out about a solar eclipse that will leave the Fire Nation defenseless. You could lead an invasion ...

Enough! I don't want to hear your ridiculous plan.  It is the strict policy of Ba Sing Se that the War not be mentioned within the walls.  Constant news of an escalating war will throw the citizens of Ba Sing Se into a state of panic.
scene_description: [Stands up, annoyed. Shot changes briefly to a confused Sokka.]

character_words: Enough! I don't want to hear your ridiculous plan.  It is the strict policy of Ba Sing Se that the War not be mentioned within the walls.  Constant news of an escalating war will throw the citizens of Ba Sing Se into a state of panic.

Enough! I don't want to hear your ridiculous plan.  It is the strict policy of Ba Sing Se that the War not be mentioned within the walls.  Constant news of an escalating war will throw the citizens of Ba Sing Se into a state of panic.
scene_description: [Scene changes as he talks to the two Dai Li agents dragging Jet into a dark room, making him sit on a stone chair.]

character_words: You have to believe me, they're firebenders! They won't stop until they win the War.
Calm down, you're safe now.
Our economy would be ruined, our peaceful way of life – our traditions – would disappear.
There's no war in Ba Sing Se.
What're you talking about?  Where do you think all the refugees come from? You can't hide it!
scene_description: [Camera changes to an aerial view zooming out.]

character_words: In silencing talk of conflict, Ba Sing Se remains a peaceful, orderly utopia: the last one on Earth.
There is no war within the walls. Here we are safe. Here, we are free.
You can't keep the truth from all these people. They have to know.
I'll tell them! I'll make sure everyone knows!
scene_description: [Stepping forward, pointing a finger at Long Feng.]

character_words: Until now, you've been treated as our honored guest.  But from now on, you will be watched every moment by Dai Li agents. If you mention the War to anyone, you will be expelled from the city.  I understand you've been looking for your bison.  It would be quite a shame if you were not able to complete your quest.  Now, Joo Dee will show you to your home.

Until now, you've been treated as our honored guest.  But from now on, you will be watched every moment by Dai Li agents. If you mention the War to anyone, you will be expelled from the city.  I understand you've been looking for your bison.  It would be quite a shame if you were not able to complete your quest.  Now, Joo Dee will show you to your home.
scene_description: [Cut to side-view of Long Feng and Aang. Long Feng steps forward and bends down to look Aang in the eye. Aang stares back at Long Feng, angrily.]

character_words: Until now, you've been treated as our honored guest.  But from now on, you will be watched every moment by Dai Li agents. If you mention the War to anyone, you will be expelled from the city.  I understand you've been looking for your bison.  It would be quite a shame if you were not able to complete your quest.  Now, Joo Dee will show you to your home.
scene_description: [He turns around and walks over to the hearth with the green fire.]

character_words: Until now, you've been treated as our honored guest.  But from now on, you will be watched every moment by Dai Li agents. If you mention the War to anyone, you will be expelled from the city.  I understand you've been looking for your bison.  It would be quite a shame if you were not able to complete your quest.  Now, Joo Dee will show you to your home.
scene_description: [View of Long Feng turning slightly to look at Aang.]

character_words: Until now, you've been treated as our honored guest.  But from now on, you will be watched every moment by Dai Li agents. If you mention the War to anyone, you will be expelled from the city.  I understand you've been looking for your bison.  It would be quite a shame if you were not able to complete your quest.  Now, Joo Dee will show you to your home.
scene_description: [Aang appears frightened, but his expression soon changes to that of anger. Cut to an overhead shot of the room. Long Feng sits down, as Joo Dee opens the doors and walks toward the group.]

character_words: Come with me, please.
What happened to Joo Dee?
I'm Joo Dee.  I'll be your host as long as you're in our wonderful city.

Come on, let's get busy!

Good tea is its own reward.

My own tea shop? This is a dream come true!
What's going on here? Are you trying to poach my tea-maker?

character_words: Sorry Pao, but that's business for you, am I right?

I'll provide you with a new apartment in the Upper Ring.  The tea shop is yours to do whatever you want,  complete creative freedom.

character_words: I'll provide you with a new apartment in the Upper Ring.  The tea shop is yours to do whatever you want,  complete creative freedom.

character_words: I even get to name the shop?

Uh, senior executive assistant manager?

That's right, young man, your life is about to change for the better!
I'll try to contain my joy.
I'll try to contain my joy.
I just finished dropping all the leaflets. Has anyone come in with news about Appa?
It's only been a day. Just be patient.
Wow, you're right! Patience really pays off!  Joo Dee?
Hello, Aang, and Katara, and Sokka, and Toph.
What happened to you? Did the Dai Li throw you in jail?
What? Jail? Of course not. The Dai Li are the protectors of our cultural heritage.

Oh, I simply took a short vacation to Lake Laogai, out in the country. It was quite relaxing.

I'm Joo Dee.
Why are you here?

We can't wait around to get permission for everything.
You are absolutely forbidden by the rules of the city to continue putting up posters.
We don't care about the rules and we're not asking permission! We're finding Appa on our own and you should just stay out of our way!

character_words: We don't care about the rules and we're not asking permission! We're finding Appa on our own and you should just stay out of our way!

I don't care! From now on, we do whatever it takes to find Appa!
Yeah, let's break some rules!
scene_description: [Takes out a side of the house with earthbending.]

character_words: I'm very disappointed in your work with the Avatar and his friends, Joo Dee. I had hoped that you would be able to control this situation.
I am so sorry, but they don't trust me anymore.  I don't think I can keep working like this!
I am so sorry, but they don't trust me anymore.  I don't think I can keep working like this!
Joo Dee, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.
I am honored to accept his invitation.
scene_description: [Camera zooms toward her eye as its iris dilates.]

character_words: Good. Now go await further orders.  If the Avatar keeps searching for his bison, it could upset the delicate balance we've worked so hard to achieve in this city. It could even cost us control of the Earth King.

Good. Now go await further orders.  If the Avatar keeps searching for his bison, it could upset the delicate balance we've worked so hard to achieve in this city. It could even cost us control of the Earth King.
scene_description: [Joo Dee nods and begins to exit. Long Feng gets up and moves to the fireplace.]

character_words: Should we take care of him?
No. It's much too dangerous for us to confront him directly. Let's see if we can still handle this quietly.
So, I was thinking about names for my new tea shop. How about the Jasmine Dragon? It's dramatic, poetic, has a nice ring to it.
The Avatar is here in Ba Sing Se and he's lost his bison.
We have a chance for a new life here.  If you start stirring up trouble, we could lose all the good things that are happening for us.
We have a chance for a new life here.  If you start stirring up trouble, we could lose all the good things that are happening for us.
scene_description: [Cut to Zuko looking out a window.]

character_words: Good things that are happening for you! Have you ever thought that I want more from life than a nice apartment and a job serving tea?
There is nothing wrong with a life of peace and prosperity. I suggest you think about what it is that you want from your life and why.
I want my destiny.
What that means is up to you.  The Tea Weevil! No, that's stupid.
We'll split up to cover more area. Toph, I guess you should just come with me.
Why? Because you think I can't put up posters on my own?!  It's upside-down, isn't it? I'll just go with Sokka.
Why? Because you think I can't put up posters on my own?!  It's upside-down, isn't it? I'll just go with Sokka.
scene_description: [Angrily takes the paintbrush of glue from Sokka and throws glue on the wall. She puts up a poster, but it is backward.]

character_words: Katara?
I think I can help you.  Katara, I've changed!
I think I can help you.  Katara, I've changed!
scene_description: [Katara's shocked blush transforms into a look of pure outrage. With a sweep of her arms, she bends up water from a lake directly at him while screaming in rage. Jet looks at the wave in fright.]

character_words: Tell it to some other girl, Jet!
scene_description: [Bending up remaining water from the wave.]

character_words: Tell it to some other girl, Jet!
scene_description: [Turns the water to ice, which sends Jet back to a wall.]

character_words: I don't want to fight you, I'm here to help!
Katara, what is it?
Jet's back.  We can't trust anything Jet says.
scene_description: [Close-up of Jet's face. Cut to aerial view before switching to a closer view of the group.]

character_words: But we don't even know why he's here!
I don't care why he's here, whatever the reason is, it can't be good!
I'm here to help you find Appa!
scene_description: [Opens his hand and reveals he is holding a missing Appa poster.]

character_words: Katara, we have to give him a chance.
scene_description: [Turning from the leaflet back to Katara.]

character_words: I swear, I've changed! I was a troubled person and I let my anger get out of control, but I don't even have the gang now! I've put all that behind me!
You're lying!
He's not lying.
scene_description: [Walks up to Jet and feels the wall he is pinned to.]

character_words: How can you tell?
I can feel his breathing and heartbeat. When people lie, there's a physical reaction. He's telling the truth.
Katara, we don't have any leads. If Jet says he can take us to Appa, we have to check it out.
All right.  But we're not letting you out of our sight.
This is the place I heard about.
There's nothing here.
If this is a trap–
I told you, I work nearby! Two guys were talking about some giant furry creature they had, I figured it must be Appa!
He was here!
scene_description: [She shows them a clump of Appa's fur.]

character_words: We missed him.
We missed him.
scene_description: [An old white haired man with a push-broom crosses behind the slumping Aang.]

character_words: They took that big thing yesterday.  Shipped him out to some island. About time, I've been cleaning up fur, and various, uhhh ... leavings all day.
What island? Where's Appa?
scene_description: [Aang swiftly moves closer to the man.]

character_words: Foreman said some rich royal type on Whaletail Island bought him up. Guess for a zoo or such. Though, could be the meat that'd be good.
We've got to get to Whaletail Island!  Where's Whaletail Island?
We've got to get to Whaletail Island!  Where's Whaletail Island?
Far, very far.  Here it is. It's near the South Pole, almost all the way back home.
Far, very far.  Here it is. It's near the South Pole, almost all the way back home.
scene_description: [Puts the map on the ground as they all gather round.]

character_words: Aang, it will take us weeks just to get to the tip of the Earth Kingdom. And then we'll need to find a boat to get to the island.
I don't care. We have a chance to find Appa! We have to try!
Must be nice to visit an island. I haven't had a vacation for years.
Don't you have some more hair to clean up?
Shuffle on, I get you. No more need for Old Sweepy ...
You're right Aang, right now our first concern has to be finding Appa. We can come back when we have him.
All right, let's get moving.
I'll come with you.
We don't need your help!
Why won't you trust me?
Gee, I wonder.
Was this guy your boyfriend or something?
What ... no!
I can tell you're lying ...
I can tell you're lying ...
We can take the train out to the wall but then we'll have to walk.
Don't worry, on the way back we'll be flying!
We're finally leaving Ba Sing Se.  Worst ... city ... ever!
Jet!
I thought you said you didn't have your "gang" anymore!
I don't!
We were so worried. How did you get away from the Dai Li?
scene_description: [Runs up to Jet and hugs him.]

character_words: We were so worried. How did you get away from the Dai Li?
scene_description: [Camera quickly zooms in to Katara's shocked face.]

character_words: The Dai Li?!
I don't know what she's talking about!
He got arrested by the Dai Li a couple of weeks ago. We saw them drag him away!
Why would I be arrested? I've been living peacefully in the city!
This doesn't make any sense. They're both telling the truth.
scene_description: [Feeling the ground between Jet and Smellerbee.]

character_words: That's impossible.
No it's not! Toph can't tell who's lying because they both think they're telling the truth. Jet's been brainwashed!
That's crazy! It can't be!  Stay away from me!
Out of my way, skinny!
Huh?
If you don't want to end up like him, you'll do what I say.
The Dai Li must have sent Jet to mislead us, and that janitor was part of their plot, too!
I bet they have Appa here in the city. Maybe he's in the same place they took Jet! Where did they take you?
Nowhere! I- I don't know what you're talking about!
We need to find a way to jog his real memories.
Maybe Katara should kiss him. That should bring something back!
Maybe you should kiss him, Sokka!
Hey, just an idea!
A bad one.
Ooh, wait! I've got it!
I don't think it's working.
Try to think of something from your past that triggers your emotions.
The Fire Nation! Remember what they did to your family!
Close your eyes. Picture it.
No! It's too painful!
Maybe this will help.
scene_description: [Takes water and puts it around his ears, using healing to clear his mind.]

character_words: They took me to a headquarters under the water. Like a lake!
Wait! Remember what Joo Dee said? She said she went on vacation to Lake Laogai!
That's it! Lake Laogai.
So where's this secret headquarters?
Under the water, I think.
There's a tunnel right there by the shore.
It's all starting to come back to me!
I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.
I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.
We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.
We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.
I think there might be a cell big enough to hold Appa up ahead. I think it's through here!
Expecting someone else?
Now that's something different.
You have made yourselves enemies of the state. Take them into custody.
Long Feng is escaping!
All right, Avatar, you've caused me enough problems. This is your last chance ... if you want your bison back.
You do have Appa! Tell me where he is!
Agree to exit the city now, and I'll waive all charges against you and allow you to leave with your lost pet.
You're in no position to bargain.
Am I not?
You're definitely not!
Jet, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.
I am honored to accept his invitation.
scene_description: [Close-up of his eye, his iris dilates.]

character_words: You're mine now.
Uncle?
So, the Blue Spirit. I wonder who could be behind that mask ...
What are you doing here?
I was just about to ask you the same thing. What do you plan to do now that you've found the Avatar's bison? Keep him locked in our new apartment? Should I go put on a pot of tea for him?
First I have to get it out of here.
And then what!? You never think these things through!  This is exactly what happened when you captured the Avatar at the North Pole! You had him, and then you had nowhere to go!
And then what!? You never think these things through!  This is exactly what happened when you captured the Avatar at the North Pole! You had him, and then you had nowhere to go!
I would have figured something out!
No! If his friends hadn't found you, you would have frozen to death!
I know my own destiny, Uncle!
Is it your own destiny, or is it a destiny someone else has tried to force on you?
Stop it, Uncle! I have to do this!
I'm begging you, Prince Zuko! It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions. Who are you, and what do you want?
Jet, it's me, Aang!  You don't have to do this!
I'm afraid he no longer has a choice.
Jet, I'm your friend! Look inside your heart!
Do your duty, Jet!
He can't make you do this!  You're a Freedom Fighter!
scene_description: [Cut to a close-up of Jet's face as he hangs his head, while panting and sweating.]

character_words: Do it! Do it now!
Foolish boy. You've chosen your own demise.
Foolish boy. You've chosen your own demise.
I'm sorry ... Aang.
Don't be.
This isn't good.
You guys go and find Appa. We'll take care of Jet.
We're not going to leave you.
There's no time. Just go. We'll take care of him. He's our leader.
Don't worry, Katara. I'll be fine.
He's lying ...
Appa's gone! Long Feng beat us here.
If we keep moving, maybe we can catch up with them!
You think we can outrun them?
I don't think it's gonna matter!
What is it, Momo?
Appa!
I can handle you by myself.
Yeah! Appa!
I missed you, buddy.
You did the right thing, nephew.  Leave it behind.
scene_description: [Zuko looks at his Blue Spirit mask as Iroh rests a hand on its shoulder.]

character_words: I missed you more than you'll ever know, buddy.
scene_description: [Momo flies into Appa to hug him too. Appa licks Aang, which causes Aang to laugh.]

character_words: Look, we escaped from the Dai Li. We got Appa back. I'm telling you, we should go to the Earth King now and tell him our plan. We're on a roll.
One good hour after weeks of trouble isn't much of a roll.
We can build on it. If we want to invade the Fire Nation when the eclipse happens, we'll need the Earth King's support.
What makes you think we'll get it? I don't know if you've noticed, but things don't usually go that smoothly for our little gang.
I know, but I've got a good feeling about this. This time will be different.
Sokka, Long Feng is in control of the city. His conspiracy with the Dai Li is too powerful. I think we should just keep flying and leave this horrible place behind us.
I'm with Sweetness. I've seen enough of Ba Sing Se.  And I can't even see!
But now that we have Appa back, there's nothing stopping us from telling the Earth King the truth. About the conspiracy and the War.
See? Aang's with me.  It's the whole reason we came here in the first place. We have to try.
scene_description: [Puts his arm around Aang and smiles.]

character_words: Well, I guess if the Earth King knew the truth, things could change.
Well, I guess if the Earth King knew the truth, things could change.
I don't trust the new positive Sokka.  Long Feng brainwashed you, didn't he!?
I don't trust the new positive Sokka.  Long Feng brainwashed you, didn't he!?
scene_description: [Points at Sokka in an accusing manner.]

character_words: That's probably the Dai Li searching for us.  So?
Let's fly!
Can we please buy a new saddle? Riding bareback is terrifying!
There it is! That whole thing is the palace! The Earth King's chamber should be in the center!
We have to be careful. Long Feng's probably warned the king that we're coming.
Why would you assume that? If you ask me, I think we're just gonna sail right in and-  Aahh!
What was that?
Surface-to-air rocks!  More incoming!
Sorry!
Sorry! We just need to get through to see the Earth King!
Seriously, we're actually on your guys' side!  Sorry.
In there!
Toph, which way to the Earth King?
How should I know? I'm still voting we leave Ba Sing Se.
Burglar!
scene_description: [Tries to run, trips, and falls flat on her face.]

character_words: Sorry. Wrong door.
You did the right thing. Letting the Avatar's bison go free.
I don't feel right.
Zuko!
Now that's an impressive door. It's gotta go somewhere.  Yaaah!  A little warning next time?
scene_description: [Drops down from the rubble and attempts to kick the door open.]

character_words: Now that's an impressive door. It's gotta go somewhere.  Yaaah!  A little warning next time?
scene_description: [The door does not move even slightly. Sokka starts trying to push it open, but to no avail. Toph and Aang jump in from behind and bust the door down, knocking Sokka forward in the process. He starts rubbing the back of his head.]

character_words: We need to talk to you.
They're here to overthrow you.
No, we're on your side. We're here to help.
You have to trust us.
You invade my palace, lay waste to all my guards, break down my fancy door, and you expect me to trust you?
scene_description: [Stands up with a rising aggravated tone.]

character_words: He has a good point.
If you are on my side, then drop your weapons and stand down!
See? We're friends, Your Earthiness.
See? We're friends, Your Earthiness.
Detain the assailants!
But we dropped our weapons. We're your allies.
Make sure the Avatar and his friends never see daylight again.
The Avatar?  You're the Avatar?
Uh, no. Him.
Over here.
scene_description: [Effortlessly breaks free of his earth cuffs and raises his arms.]

character_words: Over here.
What does it matter, Your Highness? They're enemies of the state.
Perhaps you're right.  Though Bosco seems to like him.  I'll hear what he has to say.
scene_description: [Sees Bosco sniff and lick Aang, who laughs, and smiles at Long Feng.]

character_words: Perhaps you're right.  Though Bosco seems to like him.  I'll hear what he has to say.
Perhaps you're right.  Though Bosco seems to like him.  I'll hear what he has to say.
Well, sir, there's a war going on right now. For the past one hundred years in fact. The Dai Li's kept it secret from you. It's a conspiracy to control the city, and to control you.
A secret war? That's crazy!
Completely!
Long Feng didn't want us to tell you, so he stole our sky bison to blackmail us. And blackmail is the least of his crimes; he brainwashed our friend!
All lies. I've never even seen a sky bison, Your Majesty. Frankly, I thought they were extinct.
Your claim is difficult to believe. Even from an Avatar.
These hooligans are part of an anarchist cell that my agents have been tracking for weeks. If you listen to them, you're playing right into your own destruction.
I have to trust my advisor.
Wait!  I can prove he's lying. Long Feng said he's never seen a sky bison. Ask him to lift his robe.
scene_description: [Turns to face the king with a big smile.]

character_words: What? I am not disrobing!
scene_description: [The king looks thoughtful before looking at Sokka suspiciously.]

character_words: Right there! Appa bit him!
Never met a sky bison, huh?
That happens to be a large birth mark.  Thanks for showing everyone.
That happens to be a large birth mark.  Thanks for showing everyone.
Well I suppose there's no way to prove where those marks came from.
Of course there is!
Yup. That pretty much proves it.  But it doesn't prove this crazy conspiracy theory.  Though, I suppose this matter's worth looking into.
Yup. That pretty much proves it.  But it doesn't prove this crazy conspiracy theory.  Though, I suppose this matter's worth looking into.
Yup. That pretty much proves it.  But it doesn't prove this crazy conspiracy theory.  Though, I suppose this matter's worth looking into.
scene_description: [Team Avatar look at each other approvingly, while Long Feng glares at the king before walking away with his agents.]

character_words: You're burning up.  You have an intense fever.  This will help cool you down.
You're burning up.  You have an intense fever.  This will help cool you down.
So thirsty.
scene_description: [Sits up, but Iroh makes him lie back down.]

character_words: Here's some clean water to drink.  Stay under the blankets and sweat this out.
scene_description: [Grabs a bucket with a spoon in it; takes out the spoon.]

character_words: Here's some clean water to drink.  Stay under the blankets and sweat this out.
So this is what a train is like? I didn't realize it would be this ... public.
So you've never been outside the Upper Ring before?
I've never been outside the palace.  Now that's the way to travel.  So, may I ask where we're going?
scene_description: [Katara and Sokka look at each other; the Earth King looks outside and sees Aang flying on Appa.]

character_words: I've never been outside the palace.  Now that's the way to travel.  So, may I ask where we're going?
Underneath Lake Laogai, Your Kingliness. To the Dai Li's secret headquarters. You're about to see where all the brainwashing and conspiring took place.
It's gone!
Oh don't tell me- !  That's okay. Still got my positive attitude.
scene_description: [Gives a thumbs up and a fake smile.]

character_words: The Dai Li must've known we were coming and destroyed the evidence!
Hm ...  That seems awfully convenient.
Hm ...  That seems awfully convenient.
Hey, if anything, this proves the conspiracy exists even more.
Long Feng was right. This was a waste of time.  If you'll excuse me, I'm going back to the palace.
The wall. They'll never be able to cover that up in time.
Oh, yeah.  If you come with us to the Outer Wall, we can prove to you that the secret war is real.
scene_description: [Hops to in front of the king.]

character_words: No Earth King has ever been to the Outer Wall.  I don't have any more time for this nonsense.
No Earth King has ever been to the Outer Wall.  I don't have any more time for this nonsense.
If you come with us, this time you can ride on Appa.
If you come with us, this time you can ride on Appa.
scene_description: [The Earth King stops as Appa lows in the background. A pleased smile grows on his face.]

character_words: First time flying?
It's both thrilling and terrifying!
Yeah. I hate it too.
I have to be honest with you: part of me really hopes that what you're telling me about this war isn't true.
I wish it wasn't.
It's getting late. Are you planning to retire soon, my lord?
I'm not tired.
Relax, Fire Lord Zuko. Just let go. Give in to it. Shut your eyes for a while.
No, Fire Lord Zuko! Do not listen to the blue dragon. You should get out of here right now. Go! Before it's too late!
No, Fire Lord Zuko! Do not listen to the blue dragon. You should get out of here right now. Go! Before it's too late!
scene_description: [Both dragons are poised to either side of Zuko.]

character_words: Sleep now, Fire Lord Zuko.
Sleep.  Just like mother!
scene_description: [Voice grows louder and more hostile as it continues talking.]

character_words: Zuko! Help me!
scene_description: [A distraught Zuko is seen in her eyes.]

character_words: It's still there!
What is that?
It's a drill. A giant drill  made by the Fire Nation to break through your walls.
It's a drill. A giant drill  made by the Fire Nation to break through your walls.
scene_description: [Cut to a close-up of the king who looks horrified.]

character_words: I can't believe I never knew.
scene_description: [He looks to his right as Kuei hears something.]

character_words: I can explain this, Your Majesty.  This is nothing more than ... a construction project.
scene_description: [Appears on an earth elevator with two Dai Li agents.]

character_words: I can explain this, Your Majesty.  This is nothing more than ... a construction project.
I can explain this, Your Majesty.  This is nothing more than ... a construction project.
Really? Then perhaps you could explain why there's a  Fire Nation insignia on your "construction project".
Really? Then perhaps you could explain why there's a  Fire Nation insignia on your "construction project".
scene_description: [Points to the drill as Kuei follows to where she is pointing. Cut to the Fire Nation insignia clearly shown on the drill.]

character_words: Well it's imported of course. You know you can't trust domestic machinery.  Surely you don't believe these children instead of your most loyal attendant?
Well it's imported of course. You know you can't trust domestic machinery.  Surely you don't believe these children instead of your most loyal attendant?
Dai Li! Arrest Long Feng! I want him to stand trial for crimes against the Earth Kingdom.
scene_description: [Looks at Team Avatar and Long Feng.]

character_words: You can't arrest me! You all need me more than you know!
Looks like Long Feng is long gone! Ha! Ah, yeah, I've been waiting to use that one.
Looks like Long Feng is long gone! Ha! Ah, yeah, I've been waiting to use that one.

I want to thank you, young heroes, for opening my eyes. All this time, what I thought was a great metropolis was merely a city of fools. And that makes me the king fool.  We're at war. With the Fire Nation.
scene_description: [Buries his face in one of his hands.]

character_words: That's why we came to Ba Sing Se, Your Highness: Because we think you can help us end the war.
We don't have much time. There's a comet coming this summer. Its energy will give the firebenders unbelievable strength. They'll be unstoppable.
But there is hope. Before the comet comes, we have a window of opportunity: A solar eclipse is coming. The sun will be completely blocked out by the moon, and the firebenders will be helpless.
What are you suggesting, Sokka?
That's the day we need to invade the Fire Nation.  The Day of Black Sun.
scene_description: [Cut to a close-up of the king. Cut back to Sokka.]

character_words: I don't know. That would require moving troops out of Ba Sing Se. We'd be completely vulnerable.
You're already vulnerable. The Fire Nation won't stop until Ba Sing Se falls. You can either sit back and wait for that to happen, or take the offensive and give yourself a fighting chance.
Very well. You have my support.
scene_description: [Thinks for a moment as everyone waits anxiously.]

character_words: Your Majesty.  I apologize for the interruption.
scene_description: [Walks up to Team Avatar and bows to the king.]

character_words: This is General How. He's the leader of the Council of Five, my highest ranking generals.
We searched Long Feng's office. I think we found something that will interest everybody.
There are secret files on everyone in Ba Sing Se. Including you kids.
Secret files?
"Toph Beifong."
scene_description: [Takes out a scroll and reads the side.]

character_words: "Toph Beifong."
scene_description: [Hands the scroll to General How, who hands it to Toph, who hands it to Katara.]

character_words: It's a letter from your mom. Your mom's here in the city. And she wants to see you.
It's a letter from your mom. Your mom's here in the city. And she wants to see you.
Long Feng intercepted our letters from home?  That's just sad.
Aang?
scene_description: [Takes out another scroll and hands it to Aang.]

character_words: This scroll was attached to the horn of your bison when the Dai Li captured it.
It's from the Eastern Air Temple.
Is there a letter for me and Sokka by any chance?
I'm afraid not.
Oh.
But there is an intelligence report that might interest you.
"A small fleet of Water Tribe ships."
What? That could be Dad!
"Protecting the mouth of Chameleon Bay.  Led by Hakoda."  It is Dad!
"Protecting the mouth of Chameleon Bay.  Led by Hakoda."  It is Dad!
"Protecting the mouth of Chameleon Bay.  Led by Hakoda."  It is Dad!
scene_description: [Katara and Sokka turn to each other in excitement.]

character_words: You should know that this is not a natural sickness, but that shouldn't stop you from enjoying tea.
What's happening?
Your critical decision. What you did beneath that lake. It was in such conflict with your image of yourself that you are now at war within your own mind and body.
What's that mean?
You are going through a metamorphosis, my nephew. It will not be a pleasant experience, but when you come out of it,  you will be the beautiful prince you were always meant to be.
scene_description: [Takes a cloth and wipes Zuko's head.]

character_words: I can't believe it. There's a man living at the Eastern Air Temple. He says he's a guru.
What's a guru? Some kind of poisonous blow fish?
No, a spiritual expert. He wants to help me take the next step in the Avatar journey. He says he can teach me to control the Avatar State.
And I can't believe we know where our dad is now.
I know what you mean. My mom's in the city. And from her letter it sounds like she finally understands me.
This is all such big news! Where do we even start?
I hate to say it, but we have to split up.
Split up? We just found Appa and got the family back together! Now you want us to separate?
You have to meet this guru, Aang. If we're going to invade the Fire Nation, you need to be ready.
Well, if I'm going to the Eastern Air Temple, Appa and I can drop you off at Chameleon Bay to see your dad.
Someone has to stay here with the Earth King and help him plan for the invasion.  I guess that's me.
No, Sokka. I know how badly you wanna help Dad. You go to Chameleon Bay. I'll stay here with the king.
You are the nicest ... sister ... ever!
scene_description: [Overjoyed with tears welling in his eyes. Stands up and dances happily.]

character_words: You are the nicest ... sister ... ever!
scene_description: [Throws his arms around Katara and kisses her on the cheek.]

character_words: Easy there, big brother ...  Though you're right. I am.
Katara? I need to tell you something.  I've been wanting to say it for a long time.
What is it, Aang?
Katara, I-
Katara, I-
All right. Who's ready to get going on our little men-only man trip?
All right. Who's ready to get going on our little men-only man trip?
scene_description: [Noogies Aang. Katara looks at him, annoyed.]

character_words: Aang and Sokka,  I wish you a good journey. Ba Sing Se owes you its thanks. We look forward to your safe return.
Aang and Sokka,  I wish you a good journey. Ba Sing Se owes you its thanks. We look forward to your safe return.
Your Majesty. There are three female warriors to see you. They're from the island of Kyoshi.
That's Suki!
That's Suki!
You know these warriors?
Oh yeah. The Kyoshi Warriors are a skilled group of fighters. Trustworthy too. They're good friends of ours.
Then we shall welcome them as honored guests.
Wait. Aang.
Wait. Aang.
scene_description: [Hugs him and kisses him on the cheek, which causes him to blush.]

character_words: I'm really gonna miss you guys.
Me too.
scene_description: [Hugs Toph with Aang. Sokka looks away, crossing his arms.]

character_words: Yeah.
Aahh! Great. That's enough.  Okay, we love each other.  Seriously.
Aahh! Great. That's enough.  Okay, we love each other.  Seriously.
Aahh! Great. That's enough.  Okay, we love each other.  Seriously.
scene_description: [Pats Aang and Katara on the head.]

character_words: You see, Aang? A little positive thinking works wonders. We got the king on our side, we got Long Feng arrested, and when we get back, Suki's waiting for me.
Yeah. Girls are waiting for us. Thanks, positive attitude.
Everything is gonna work out perfectly. From now on and forever.
scene_description: [Aang turns around and smiles at him.]

character_words: Dinner.  The Council of Five and the military are loyal to the Earth King,  but the Dai Li remains loyal to you, Long Feng, sir.
scene_description: [Slides a tray of food underneath the door.]

character_words: Dinner.  The Council of Five and the military are loyal to the Earth King,  but the Dai Li remains loyal to you, Long Feng, sir.
Dinner.  The Council of Five and the military are loyal to the Earth King,  but the Dai Li remains loyal to you, Long Feng, sir.
Dinner.  The Council of Five and the military are loyal to the Earth King,  but the Dai Li remains loyal to you, Long Feng, sir.
scene_description: [Walks away as Long Feng eats his food while smiling sinisterly.]

character_words: Hello? Mom? Anyone home?  Hey! Who do you think you're dealing with!?
Hello? Mom? Anyone home?  Hey! Who do you think you're dealing with!?
scene_description: [Walks to the center of the room. She senses something, but is quickly captured in a metal box.]

character_words: One loud-mouthed little brat who strayed too far from home.
In our hour of need, it is with the highest honor that I welcome our esteemed allies, the Kyoshi Warriors!
We are the Earth King's humble servants.
What's that smell?
It's jook. I'm sure you wouldn't like it.
Actually, it smells delicious. I'd love a bowl, Uncle.
Actually, it smells delicious. I'd love a bowl, Uncle.
Now that your fever is gone, you seem different somehow.
It's a new day. We've got a new apartment, new furniture, and today's the grand opening of your new tea shop.  Things are looking up, Uncle.
It's a new day. We've got a new apartment, new furniture, and today's the grand opening of your new tea shop.  Things are looking up, Uncle.
It's a new day. We've got a new apartment, new furniture, and today's the grand opening of your new tea shop.  Things are looking up, Uncle.
scene_description: [Iroh's shocked expression changes to a smile.]

character_words: You haven't seen your dad in over two years. You must be so excited!
I know I should be, but, I just feel sick to my stomach.
I know I should be, but, I just feel sick to my stomach.
Don't be nervous. He's going to be so happy to see you!
scene_description: [He puts his hand on Sokka's shoulder who smiles.]

character_words: So what about you? Are you nervous to meet this guru?
Not at all. I'm ready to master the Avatar State. I'll do whatever it takes.  See you in a week. Yip yip!
Sokka, good to see you.
Sokka.
Hi, Dad.

Look Bosco! The Kyoshi Warriors are here to protect us! Aren't you excited?  It's been a difficult week for me. My most trusted advisor, Long Feng, and his Dai Li agents tried to take control of Ba Sing Se from me.
It's terrible when you can't trust the people who are closest to you.
But there is good news. As we speak, the Council of Five is meeting to plan an invasion of the Fire Nation this summer, on the day of a solar eclipse.
Really? Now that sounds like a fascinating and brilliant plan.
scene_description: [Glances off as Mai and Ty Lee look at each other.]

character_words: General Fong's base will serve as the launching point for the attack. In exactly two months, the army and navy will invade the Fire Nation on the Day of Black Sun.
Or we could send in Momo to do some damage!  'Cause, the ... sorry.
All we need is the Earth King's seal in order to execute the plan.
scene_description: [Uses earthbending to stand the pieces back up, scaring Momo.]

character_words: All we need is the Earth King's seal in order to execute the plan.
scene_description: [Sends the scroll across the table to Katara.]

character_words: I'll get these scrolls to him right away. Thank you, General How.
Uhhh ... hello? You're Guru Pathik, right?  The person who attached the note to Appa's horn?
Indeed. I was a spiritual brother of your people, and a personal friend of Monk Gyatso.
In your note,  you said you could teach me how to gain control of the Avatar State. How?
You must gain balance within yourself, before you can bring balance to the world. And the first step to gaining balance begins with this.  Drink up!
scene_description: [Hands Aang a yellow beverage in a wooden cup.]

character_words: Uggh! It tastes like onion and banana juice!
scene_description: [Takes it and looks at it. Drinks it and quickly spits it out to his left in disgust.]

character_words: That's because it is!  Yum yum!
scene_description: [Pathik empties another bowl and holds it over his head.]

character_words: I believe we need to go right!
What are you talking about? The Beifong Estate's this way!
I'm quite certain you're mistaken.
Hey! Can you two old ladies quit your bickering for a second? I got to go to the bathroom!
Oooh ... uhhh, okay, but make it quick!
scene_description: [Getting up with a key in hand.]

character_words: What's wrong with you?
Ooh, very sneaky Toph! Nice try, but you can't trick me!
Let me out of here so I can kick both your butts!
Quit your banging!  You might think you're the greatest earthbender in the world, but even you can't bend metal!
We have been presented with an extraordinary opportunity, girls.
Mai finally gets to wear make-up that's not totally depressing?
Ha, ha.
scene_description: [With large, dark splotches of black makeup dripping down her eyes; Sarcastically.]

character_words: I'm talking about conquering the whole Earth Kingdom.  For one hundred years, the Fire Nation has hammered away at Ba Sing Se from the outside. But now we're on the inside, and we can take it by ourselves.
scene_description: [The two girls turn with shocked looks.]

character_words: Gosh, you're so confident. I really admire that about you.
From the inside, we're in perfect position to organize a coup and overthrow the Earth King. The key is the Dai Li. Whoever controls the Dai Li  controls Ba Sing Se.
In order to master the Avatar State, you must open all the chakras. Aang, tell me everything you know about chakras.
What are chakras?

Oh, I see. I guess we'll start with the basics.  The water flows through this creek, much like the energy flows through your body. As you see, there are several pools where the water swirls around before flowing on. These pools are like our chakras.
scene_description: [As he explains he points to the water and the moss within.]

character_words: So chakras are pools of spiraling energy in our bodies?
Exactly. If nothing else were around, this creek would flow pure and clear. However, life is messy, and things tend to fall in the creek. And then what happens?
The creek can't flow?
Yes. But, if we open the ponds between the pools ...
scene_description: [He removes moss blocking the exit for the water.]

character_words: The energy flows!

There are seven chakras that go up the body. Each pool of energy has a purpose, and can be blocked by a specific kind of emotional muck. Be warned, opening the chakras is an intense experience, and once you begin the process, you cannot stop until all seven are open. Are you ready?
I'll do whatever it takes.
First we will open the Earth Chakra, located at the base of the spine. It deals with survival, and is blocked by fear. What are you most afraid of? Let your fears become clear to you.
Aang, your vision is not real. You are concerned for your survival, but you must surrender those fears. Let your fears flow down the creek.  You have opened your Earth Chakra!
Aang, your vision is not real. You are concerned for your survival, but you must surrender those fears. Let your fears flow down the creek.  You have opened your Earth Chakra!
Next is the ...
Water Chakra?
Brilliant! Maybe one day you will be a guru too! This chakra deals with pleasure and is blocked by guilt. Now, look at all the guilt with burdens you so. What do you blame yourself for?
I ran away.  I hurt all of those people.
scene_description: [Sees the image of him leaving home.]

character_words: I ran away.  I hurt all of those people.
scene_description: [Sees images of him in the Avatar State at General Fong's base.]

character_words: Accept the reality that these things happened, but do not let them cloud and poison your energy. If you are to be a positive influence on the world, you need to forgive yourself.
This bay leads directly to the outskirts of Ba Sing Se. We've been using these tangle mines to stop the Fire Nation ships from getting through.
Your father invented tangle mines himself.
scene_description: [Filling the mine with skunk fish and seaweed before moving away.]

character_words: Destructive? Buoyant? And ...  Aggh, ehhh! Terrible smelling!

Very perceptive. The mines are filled with skunk fish and seaweed. When a ship detonates the mine, the seaweed tangles up the propeller and the foul smell forces people to abandon the ship. I call it the "stink and sink."
Good one, Dad!
You're definitely your father's son.
Hakoda, our scouts have spotted four Fire Nation ships!
Bato, get these mines loaded up! The rest of you men, prepare for battle!
Uhhh ... what should I do, Dad?
Aren't you listening? I said, "The rest of you men, get ready for battle".
Who thought when we came to this city as refugees, that I'd end up owning my own tea shop? Follow your passion, Zuko, and life will reward you.
Congratulations, Uncle.
I am very thankful.
You deserve it. The Jasmine Dragon will be the best tea shop in the city.
No. I'm thankful because you decided to share this special day with me. It means more than you know.
Now let's make these people some tea!
Yes, let's make some tea!
Third is the Fire Chakra, located in the stomach.
My Fire Chakra would like to eat something other than onion-banana juice.
Good one! Moving on. This chakra deals with willpower, and is blocked by shame. What are you ashamed of?  What are your biggest disappointments in yourself?
Good one! Moving on. This chakra deals with willpower, and is blocked by shame. What are you ashamed of?  What are your biggest disappointments in yourself?
scene_description: [Cuts to Aang's vision of his first attempt at firebending, which resulted in him accidentally burning Katara's hands.]

character_words: I'm never going to firebend again. I can't.

You will never find balance if you deny this part of your life. You are the Avatar and therefore, you are a firebender.  Hmmm ... that chakra opened less like a flowing creek, and more like a ... burping bison.
Tastes like onions and bananas, but strangely something else. Pickles?
Tastes like onions and bananas, but strangely something else. Pickles?
I'm tired of wearing this girly disguise. I don't know how anyone could fight in this.
Maybe that's why it was so easy to beat the Kyoshi Warriors and take their clothes.
How much longer do we have to serve the Earth King? If I have to clean up one more pile of bear poop, I'm going to throw up.
Princess Azula promised we would go back to the Fire Nation as soon as we captured the Avatar. We just have to be patient.
Shush up! Do you want the whole palace to know we're Fire Nation?
Sorry!
Good work, girls. I'm sure the Dai Li will deliver the message.
The fourth chakra is located in the heart. It deals with love and is blocked by grief.  Lay all your grief out in front of you.
scene_description: [Aang smiles and looks at a Air Nomad statue nearby before looking sad.]

character_words: You have indeed felt a great loss.  But love is a form of energy, and it swirls all around us.  The Air Nomads' love for you has not left this world. It is still inside of your heart, and is reborn in the form of new love.
scene_description: [The airbenders appear floating in the clouds.]

character_words: You have indeed felt a great loss.  But love is a form of energy, and it swirls all around us.  The Air Nomads' love for you has not left this world. It is still inside of your heart, and is reborn in the form of new love.
scene_description: [Aang is lifted into the air and sees the Air Nomads floating in the smoke.]

character_words: Let the pain flow away.  Very good.
Can I have some onion-banana juice, please?
The fifth in the chain is the Sound Chakra, located in the throat. It deals with truth and is blocked by lies. The ones we tell ourselves.
Why didn't you tell us you were the Avatar?
Because I never wanted to be.
You cannot lie about your own nature. You must accept that you are the Avatar.  Very good, Aang. You have opened the chakra of truth.
scene_description: [Aang inhales and, seeing an image of himself on a cliff looking down at the ground, exhales, and accepts his nature.]

character_words: The sixth pool of energy is the light chakra, located in the center of the forehead. It deals with insight and is blocked by illusion. The greatest illusion of this world is the illusion of separation. Things you think are separate and different are actually one in the same.
Like the four nations.
scene_description: [An image is shown of the world, with the four nations' territories marked.]

character_words: Yes. We are all one people,  but we live as if divided.
scene_description: [The image changes so the territories become the same color.]

character_words: Yes. We are all one people,  but we live as if divided.
We're all connected. Everything is connected.

That's right! Even the separation of the four elements is an illusion. If you open your mind, you will see that all the elements are one. Four parts of the same whole. Even metal is just a part of earth that has been purified and refined.
Come on, metal. Budge!  Wooo! Toph, you rule.
Come on, metal. Budge!  Wooo! Toph, you rule.
scene_description: [She punches a hole in the metal and shakes her hand in pain.]

character_words: What do you say, Momo? A cup of tea before we get back to the king?  Table for two, please.
Uncle! I need two jasmine, one green, and one lychee!
I'm brewing as fast as I can!
This is the last chakra, isn't it?
Yes. Once you open this chakra, you will be able to go in and out of the Avatar State at will and when you are in the Avatar State, you will have complete control and awareness of all your actions.
Let's do this.

The Thought Chakra is located at the crown of the head. It deals with pure cosmic energy, and is blocked by earthly attachment. Meditate on what attaches you to this world.  Now, let all of those attachments go. Let them flow down the river, forgotten.
What? Why would I let go of Katara? I ... I love her!
Learn to let her go, or you cannot let the pure cosmic energy flow in from the universe.
Why would I choose cosmic energy over Katara?  How could it be a bad thing that I feel an attachment to her? Three chakras ago that was a good thing!
You must learn to let go.
Thank goodness you're here, Suki. Something terrible is going on. The Fire Nation has infiltrated the city, I just saw Prince Zuko and his uncle!  We have to tell the Earth King right away!
scene_description: [Azula widens her eyes in surprise and smiles slyly.]

character_words: Oh, don't worry, I'll be sure to let him know.
So, Zuzu's in the city, too? I think it's time for a family reunion.
scene_description: [While the three girls gather around the fallen Katara; pans to camera looking up to the three girls.]

character_words: So, Zuzu's in the city, too? I think it's time for a family reunion.
I'm sorry, but I can't let go of Katara.
Aang, to master the Avatar State, you must open all the chakras. Surrender yourself.
Okay, I'll try.
Now think of your attachments and let them go. Let the pure cosmic energy flow.
Katara's in danger! I have to go!
No, Aang! By choosing attachment, you have locked the chakra! If you leave now, you won't be able to go into the Avatar State at all!
It's another one her tricks!
There's a giant hole in the box! How is that a trick!?
It's not! It's the real deal!
I am the greatest earthbender in the world! Don't you two dunderheads ever forget it!
I am the greatest earthbender in the world! Don't you two dunderheads ever forget it!
scene_description: [Stomps on the box and exits using earth surfing.]

character_words: I'm going to be stuck in here forever with you, aren't I?
I have to go the bathroom.
scene_description: [Xin Fu groans and slams his head against the box.]

character_words: Ready to go knock some Fire Nation heads?
You don't know how much this means to me, Dad. I'll make you proud and I'll finally prove to you what a great warrior I am.
Sokka, you don't have to prove anything to me. I'm already proud of you and I've always known you're a great warrior.
Really?
Why do you think I trusted you to look after our tribe when I left?
This can't be good news.
What is this about? Your agents show up in the middle of the night and drag me down here? You will not treat a Kyoshi Warrior this way!
But you're not a Kyoshi Warrior, are you,  Princess Azula of the Fire Nation?
What do you want?
I want to make a deal. It's time that I regain control of Ba Sing Se and you have something I need.
Oh?
The Earth King's trust.
Why should I help you?
Because I can get you the Avatar.
I'm listening ...
A message from the Royal Palace.
I ... I can't believe it!
What is it, Uncle?
Great news! We've been invited to serve tea to the Earth King!
Great news! We've been invited to serve tea to the Earth King!
So, what kind of trouble is Katara in?
I don't know. In my vision, I just knew she needed help.
It would be nice if your Avatar powers could be just a little more specific from time to time.  What is that?
scene_description: [He looks down and notices a mound of earth passing nearby, heading to the wall.]

character_words: Need a ride?

The Earth King and the Council of Five do not trust the Dai Li. They imprisoned your leader, Long Feng. Soon they will turn on all of you and eliminate you. Seizing power today is a matter of life and death.  This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously. Long Feng has placed you in my command while we overthrow the government.  If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all,  I will snuff it out.  That is all.

The Earth King and the Council of Five do not trust the Dai Li. They imprisoned your leader, Long Feng. Soon they will turn on all of you and eliminate you. Seizing power today is a matter of life and death.  This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously. Long Feng has placed you in my command while we overthrow the government.  If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all,  I will snuff it out.  That is all.
scene_description: [As she talks, an agent with a mustache starts looking nervous and slightly lowers his head.]

character_words: The Earth King and the Council of Five do not trust the Dai Li. They imprisoned your leader, Long Feng. Soon they will turn on all of you and eliminate you. Seizing power today is a matter of life and death.  This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously. Long Feng has placed you in my command while we overthrow the government.  If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all,  I will snuff it out.  That is all.
scene_description: [Walks over to her left, to another agent with a tiny, vertical scar on his right cheek. When she nears him, she stares sideways at the agent while still addressing all the agents.]

character_words: The Earth King and the Council of Five do not trust the Dai Li. They imprisoned your leader, Long Feng. Soon they will turn on all of you and eliminate you. Seizing power today is a matter of life and death.  This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously. Long Feng has placed you in my command while we overthrow the government.  If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all,  I will snuff it out.  That is all.
scene_description: [She stops right in front of the scarred agent.]

character_words: The Earth King and the Council of Five do not trust the Dai Li. They imprisoned your leader, Long Feng. Soon they will turn on all of you and eliminate you. Seizing power today is a matter of life and death.  This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously. Long Feng has placed you in my command while we overthrow the government.  If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all,  I will snuff it out.  That is all.
scene_description: [She continues walking, with the eyes of the now nervous scarred agent following her.]

character_words: Nice speech, Azula. It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way.
scene_description: [She hands the cup to Azula. Camera pans over to a close-up of Mai.]

character_words: Yeah. I thought you were going to make that one guy pee his pants.
There are still a few loose ends. The Avatar, and my brother and uncle.

Many times I imagined myself here, at the threshold of the palace.  But I always thought I would be here as a conqueror. Instead, we are the Earth King's personal guests, here to serve him tea. Destiny is a funny thing.
scene_description: [Camera pans to show the Earth Kingdom Emblem above the palace doors.]

character_words: It sure is, Uncle.
So how did it go with the guru? Did you master the Avatar State?
Uh ...
If you leave now, you won't be able to go into the Avatar State at all!
Aang, are you okay?
I'm great! It went great with the guru. I completely mastered the Avatar State.  Yeah.
What's taking so long?
Maybe the Earth King overslept.
Something's not right.
It's tea time!
Azula!
Have you met the Dai Li? They're earthbenders, but they have a killer instinct that's so firebender. I just love it.
Did I ever tell you how I got the nickname "the Dragon of the West"?
I'm not interested in a lengthy anecdote, Uncle.
It's more of a demonstration, really.
Come on! You'll be fine!
No! I'm tired of running! It's time I faced Azula!
You're so dramatic. What? Are you going to challenge me to an Agni Kai?
Yes! I challenge you!
No thanks.
Katara's fine. You have nothing to worry about.
But, in my vision, I felt so sure she was in trouble.
Well, she met with the Council of Generals to plan the invasion, and since then, she been off with your friends, the Kyoshi Warriors.
See, Aang? She's with Suki. They're probably back at our apartment right now talking about make-up or something.
Okay. Maybe you're right.
Believe me, if there was any danger at all, Bosco's animal instincts would sense it.
You've got company.
Zuko!
Momo!
There's no one else here.
Katara is in trouble! I knew it!
Oh, no!
Wait! Someone's at the door.  Actually, I know who it is. It's an old friend of mine.  Glad to see you're okay.
scene_description: [Someone knocks on the door a second later.]

character_words: Wait! Someone's at the door.  Actually, I know who it is. It's an old friend of mine.  Glad to see you're okay.
scene_description: [She walks over to the door and opens it, showing Iroh behind the door.]

character_words: I need your help.
You guys know each other?
I met him in the woods once and knocked him down. Then he gave me some tea and some very good advice.
May I come in?  Princess Azula is here in Ba Sing Se.
scene_description: [Toph nods, and he walks in before turning to the group.]

character_words: She must have Katara.
She has captured my nephew as well.
Then we'll work together to fight Azula, and save Katara and Zuko.
Whoa there! You lost me at "Zuko".
I know how you must feel about my nephew.  But believe me when I tell you that there is good inside him.
scene_description: [Moving forward to place his hands on Sokka's shoulders.]

character_words: "Good inside him" isn't enough! Why don't you come back when it's outside him too, okay?
Katara's in trouble. All of Ba Sing Se is in trouble. Working together is our best chance.
I brought someone along who might help us.
Azula and Long Feng are plotting a coup! They're going to overthrow the Earth King!
My sister! Where are they keeping Katara?
In the Crystal Catacombs of Old Ba Sing Se, deep beneath the palace.
The movements of the Earth King and all the generals have been plotted out step-by-step.
Good. And the Fire Nation princess is cooperating?
Oh, yes. More than cooperating. She's really taken charge. She's terrifying and inspirational at the same time. It's hard to explain.
Why did they throw you in here?  Oh, wait, let me guess. It's a trap. So that when Aang shows up to help me, you can finally have him in your little Fire Nation clutches!

You're a terrible person! You know that? Always following us! Hunting the Avatar! Trying to capture the world's last hope for peace! But what do you care? You're the Fire Lord's son. Spreading war and violence and hatred is in your blood!
You don't know what you're talking about!
I don't? How dare you! You have no idea what this war has put me through!  Me personally!  The Fire Nation took my mother away from me.
I don't? How dare you! You have no idea what this war has put me through!  Me personally!  The Fire Nation took my mother away from me.
I don't? How dare you! You have no idea what this war has put me through!  Me personally!  The Fire Nation took my mother away from me.
scene_description: [She sits down and touches her necklace, begins to cry.]

character_words: I'm sorry.  That's something we have in common.
I'm sorry.  That's something we have in common.
Well, what'd you know? There is an ancient city down there. But it's deep.
We should split up. Aang, you go with Iroh to look for Katara and the angry jerk,  no offense.
scene_description: [Remembers Iroh is there and places his left hand on Iroh's right shoulder.]

character_words: None taken.
And I'll go with Toph to warn the Earth King of Azula's coup.
So, Toph thinks you give pretty good advice, and great tea!
The key to both is proper aging. What's on your mind?
Well, I met with this guru who was supposed to help me master the Avatar State and control this great power, but to do it, I had to let go of someone I love.  And I just couldn't.
Perfection and power are overrated. I think you were very wise to choose happiness and love.
What happens if we can't save anyone and beat Azula? Without the Avatar State, what if I'm not powerful enough?
I don't know the answer. Sometimes, life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you just keep moving,  you will come to a better place.
scene_description: [Aang earthbends the rocks away one last time. Iroh's fire blows out. He smiles.]

character_words: There's General How!
What's going on here?
You're under house arrest.
The coup is happening right now! We've gotta warn the Earth King!
Thank goodness we're in time!
In time for what?
Yeah. What are you in time for,  cutie?
Uh, I'm kinda involved with Suki.
Who?
They're not the real Kyoshi Warriors!
Sorry to disappoint you.
Oooh, it's like we're dancing together!
This fight is over.
Get them all out of my sight.
Now comes the part where I double cross you. Dai Li, arrest the Fire Nation princess!  I said arrest her! What is wrong with you?!
scene_description: [None of the Dai Li agents move, to Long Feng's disappointment.]

character_words: It's because they haven't made up their minds. They're waiting to see how this is going to end.
What are you talking about?

I can see your whole history in your eyes. You were born with nothing, so you've had to struggle, and connive, and claw your way to power. But true power, the divine right to rule, is something you're born with. The fact is, they don't know which one of us is going to be sitting on that throne, and which one is going to be bowing down.  But I know, and you know.  Well?

I can see your whole history in your eyes. You were born with nothing, so you've had to struggle, and connive, and claw your way to power. But true power, the divine right to rule, is something you're born with. The fact is, they don't know which one of us is going to be sitting on that throne, and which one is going to be bowing down.  But I know, and you know.  Well?
scene_description: [She sits down on the throne and crosses her legs.]

character_words: You've beaten me at my own game.
Don't flatter yourself! You were never even a player.
I'm sorry I yelled at you before.
It doesn't matter.
It's just that for so long now, whenever I would imagine the face of the enemy, it was your face.
My face? I see.
No, no, that's-that's not what I mean.

It's okay. I used to think this scar marked me. The mark of the banished prince, cursed to chase the Avatar forever. But lately, I've realized I'm free to determine my own destiny, even if I'll never be free of my mark.
Maybe you could be free of it.
What?
I have healing abilities.
It's a scar, it can't be healed.
This is water from the Spirit Oasis at the North Pole. It has special properties, so I've been saving it for something important.  I don't know if it would work, but ...
This is water from the Spirit Oasis at the North Pole. It has special properties, so I've been saving it for something important.  I don't know if it would work, but ...
Aang!
Aang, I knew you would come.
Uncle, I don't understand. What are you doing with the Avatar?
Saving you, that's what.
Zuko, it's time we talked.  Go help you other friends. We'll catch up with you.
