character_words: Sokka, we're on our way to victory!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
character_words: No.  No, no, no! Fire Lord Ozai, where are you!?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Dad!  You're on your feet again.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Dad!  You're on your feet again.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Thanks to your sister. I'm in no shape to fight, but maybe there's some way I can help.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Everything's going smoothly and the eclipse hasn't even kicked in yet.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Let's hope our luck holds out.  Katara, you seem distracted. Is something wrong?
scene_description: [Katara moves away, sensing something in the distance.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Let's hope our luck holds out.  Katara, you seem distracted. Is something wrong?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Yeah. Is that ... is that Aang?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: What?  Please tell me you're here because the Fire Lord turned out to be a big wimp and you didn't even need the eclipse to take him down.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: What?  Please tell me you're here because the Fire Lord turned out to be a big wimp and you didn't even need the eclipse to take him down.
scene_description: [Cuts to shot of Aang riding in on his glider, dodging several fireballs. He lands in front of the group.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: He wasn't home. No one was. The entire palace city is abandoned.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: They knew.
scene_description: [With epiphany; the camera shifts from a side-view of his face to a frontal view.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: It's over. The Fire Lord is probably long-gone; far away on some remote island where he'll be safe during the eclipse.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: No. My instincts tell me he wouldn't go too far. He would have a secret bunker; somewhere he could go and be safe during the siege but still be close enough to lead his nation.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: If it's an underground secret bunker we're looking for,  I'm just the girl to find it.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: The mechanist gave me this timing device. It looks like we've got about ten minutes until the full eclipse. Ten minutes to find the Fire Lord.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We can still do this. We can still win the day.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Wait! If they knew we were coming it could all be a trap.  Maybe we should use the time we have left to make sure we all get out of here safely.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Wait! If they knew we were coming it could all be a trap.  Maybe we should use the time we have left to make sure we all get out of here safely.
scene_description: [Looks at the others; the camera pans to the right.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Everyone who's here today came prepared to risk everything for this mission. They know what's at stake. If there's still a chance and there's still hope, I think they would want Aang to go for it.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: What do you think? You're the one that has to face the Fire Lord. Whatever you decide, I'm with you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I've gotta try.
scene_description: [Rising, turning his back to the group, determined.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Do you feel anything down there?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Yep. There are natural tunnels criss-crossing through the inside of the volcano.
scene_description: [Placing her hand on the ground to feel vibrations.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Anything else? Is there a structure somewhere?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: There is something big, dense and made of metal deep in the heart of the volcano.
scene_description: [Taking her hands and digging her fingers into the surface.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Sounds like a secret bunker to me.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Stay safe. We'll be back soon.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: This way! That one's a dead end!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: What would we do without you?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Perish in burning hot magma.
scene_description: [Camera view changes to show the group walking past magma channels.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Yeah, pretty much.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: The tunnel continues on the other side and It leads right to the bunker.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We'll have to be fast, but careful.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: How is that careful?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I was wrong. We need to be fast, careful and lucky.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: There's no floor. It's just a river of lava.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Climb aboard and hold on tight.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: That's some door!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Not a problem.
scene_description: [Walks over to the door and bangs the metal with her fist.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I am so glad we added you to the group!
scene_description: [Entering the bunker while making some hand movements.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Retreat! Everyone move to the secondary defensive position! Retreat!
scene_description: [Witnessing the sun as the moon begins to overshadow it.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: The eclipse is only minutes away. We should be able to make it up to hill by the time it starts and secure the entire palace by the time it's finished.
scene_description: [Standing from the side of an Earth Kingdom tank.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We can wait here if you want.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: No. I wanna press forward with the others.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: The Fire Lord's chamber is that way, down the hall, to the left,  and up the stairs, you can't miss it!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: The Fire Lord's chamber is that way, down the hall, to the left,  and up the stairs, you can't miss it!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Thanks!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Only thirty seconds until the total eclipse.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I'm ready. I'm ready to face the Fire Lord.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: So, you are alive after all.  I had a hunch that you survived. But it doesn't matter.  I've known about the invasion for months.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: So, you are alive after all.  I had a hunch that you survived. But it doesn't matter.  I've known about the invasion for months.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I'm ready to face you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Prince Zuko? What are you doing here?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: The eclipse is starting!  Put on your eclipse glasses!
scene_description: [Pulls out specialized eyewear and puts it on.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Why are you here?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I'm here to tell the truth.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Telling the truth during the middle of an eclipse.  This should be interesting.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Telling the truth during the middle of an eclipse.  This should be interesting.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: First of all, in Ba Sing Se, it was Azula who took down the Avatar, not me.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Why would she lie to me about that?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Because the Avatar's not dead. He survived.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: What?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: In fact, he's probably leading this invasion. He could be on his way here right now.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Get out! Get out of my sight right now if you know what's good for you!
scene_description: [Rises from his seat and points toward the door.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: That's another thing. I'm not taking orders from you anymore.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: You will obey me, or this defiant breath will be your last!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Think again. I am going to speak my mind, and you are going to listen.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Where is he? Where's the Fire Lord?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: You mean I'm not good enough for you?  You're hurting my feelings.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: You mean I'm not good enough for you?  You're hurting my feelings.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Stop wasting our time and give us the information.  You're powerless right now, so you're in no position to refuse.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: And stick to the truth. I'll be able to tell if you're lying.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Are you sure? I'm a pretty good liar.  I am a four-hundred foot tall purple platypus bear with pink horns and silver wings.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Are you sure? I'm a pretty good liar.  I am a four-hundred foot tall purple platypus bear with pink horns and silver wings.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Okay, you're good, I admit it.  But you ought to consider telling the truth anyway!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Okay, you're good, I admit it.  But you ought to consider telling the truth anyway!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: When I left Ba Sing Se I brought home some souvenirs: Dai Li agents!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Surround the periphery!  We have to secure the palace by the time the eclipse is over! Otherwise, we'll be in for the fight of our lives.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Stop! Surrender peacefully and we won't harm you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We'll never surrender!  Okay, we surrender.
scene_description: [Makes frenzied motions and tries to firebend, but cannot.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We'll never surrender!  Okay, we surrender.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: There it is: the Fire Nation Royal Palace. We've come so far.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: It's not over yet.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: For so long, all I wanted was for you to love me, to accept me. I thought it was my honor I wanted, but really, I was just trying to please you. You, my father, who banished me just for talking out of turn.  My father, who challenged me, a thirteen-year-old boy, to an Agni Kai.  How could you possibly justify a duel with a child?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: For so long, all I wanted was for you to love me, to accept me. I thought it was my honor I wanted, but really, I was just trying to please you. You, my father, who banished me just for talking out of turn.  My father, who challenged me, a thirteen-year-old boy, to an Agni Kai.  How could you possibly justify a duel with a child?
scene_description: [Cuts to shot of Ozai, looking angered.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: It was to teach you respect!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: It was cruel! And it was wrong.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Then you have learned nothing!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: No, I've learned everything! And I've had to learn it on my own! Growing up, we were taught that the Fire Nation was the greatest civilization in history. And somehow, the War was our way of sharing our greatness with the rest of the world. What an amazing lie that was. The people of the world are terrified by the Fire Nation. They don't see our greatness. They hate us! And we deserve it!  We've created an era of fear in the world. And if we don't want the world to destroy itself , we need to replace it with an era of peace and kindness.
scene_description: [Camera view shows top profile of Zuko and Ozai through an overhead grate.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: No, I've learned everything! And I've had to learn it on my own! Growing up, we were taught that the Fire Nation was the greatest civilization in history. And somehow, the War was our way of sharing our greatness with the rest of the world. What an amazing lie that was. The people of the world are terrified by the Fire Nation. They don't see our greatness. They hate us! And we deserve it!  We've created an era of fear in the world. And if we don't want the world to destroy itself , we need to replace it with an era of peace and kindness.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Your uncle has gotten to you, hasn't he?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Yes.  He has.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I can't pin her down! She's too quick!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Wait! Aang! Toph! Stop attacking! Don't you see what she's doing? She's just playing with us. She's not even trying to win this fight!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Not true. I'm giving it my all.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: You're trying to keep us here and waste all our time!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Um, right, I think your friend just said that, genius. And since you can't see, I should tell you I'm rolling my eyes.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Um, right, I think your friend just said that, genius. And since you can't see, I should tell you I'm rolling my eyes.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I'll roll your whole head!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: She's just baiting you again.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Okay, so what do we do, just ignore her?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We don't have a choice. We just have to get out of here and find the Fire Lord on our own somehow.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: It's a trap. Don't say I didn't warn you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Ignore!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: So, Sokka's your name, right? My favorite prisoner used to mention you all the time.  She was convinced you were going to come rescue her. Of course you never came, and she gave up on you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: So, Sokka's your name, right? My favorite prisoner used to mention you all the time.  She was convinced you were going to come rescue her. Of course you never came, and she gave up on you.
scene_description: [Sokka stops walking and casts Azula a suspicious glance.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Come and get it.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Where. Is. Suki?!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: After I leave here today, I'm gonna free Uncle Iroh from his prison and I'm gonna beg for his forgiveness.  He's the one who's been a real father to me.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Oh, that's just beautiful. And maybe he can pass down to you the ways of tea and failure.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: But I've come to an even more important decision.  I'm going to join the Avatar and I'm going to help him defeat you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Really? Since you're a full-blown traitor now and you want me gone, why wait? I'm powerless. You've got your swords. Why don't you just do it now?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Because I know my own destiny. Taking you down is the Avatar's destiny.  Goodbye.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Coward! You think you're brave enough to face me, but you'll only do it during the eclipse. If you have any real courage, you'll stick around until the sun comes out. Don't you want to know what happened to your mother?
scene_description: [Camera focuses on Zuko walking away, the Fire Lord in the background, now on his feet.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: What happened that night?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: My father, Fire Lord Azulon, had commanded me to do the unthinkable to you, my own son, and I was going to do it.  Your mother found out and swore she would protect you at any cost.  She knew I wanted the throne and she proposed a plan, a plan in which I would become Fire Lord and your life would be spared.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: My father, Fire Lord Azulon, had commanded me to do the unthinkable to you, my own son, and I was going to do it.  Your mother found out and swore she would protect you at any cost.  She knew I wanted the throne and she proposed a plan, a plan in which I would become Fire Lord and your life would be spared.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Where's Suki? Answer me!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Sokka, she won't talk.
scene_description: [Grabs Sokka's shoulder as camera pans slightly to the right.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Where are you keeping her?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Your mother did vicious, treasonous things that night. She knew the consequences and accepted them. For her treason, she was banished.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: So she's alive?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Perhaps. Now I realize that banishment is far too merciful a penalty for treason.  Your penalty will be far steeper.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Perhaps. Now I realize that banishment is far too merciful a penalty for treason.  Your penalty will be far steeper.
scene_description: [Ozai closes his eyes. Shot fades to outside where the solar eclipse begins to end.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Oh, sounds like the firebending's back on.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Dad's all the way at the end of the hall then down a secret stairway on the left. I'm sure he'd be more than happy to see you now.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I fell for it! I used up all our time.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: It's not your fault, Sokka. Azula was ready for us. She had every move planned out.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: And now it's too late.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Maybe it's not too late. The eclipse is over. But I can face the Fire Lord anyway.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: No. I don't think that's a good idea.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: But I'm ready! I came here with a job to do and everyone's counting on me.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: The Fire Lord knew we were coming this time. We thought we had surprise on our side but we didn't. It just wasn't our day. What we need to do now is go and help our friends.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I guess you guys are right.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: You'll have another chance. I know you will.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: What should we do, Hakoda? Shouldn't something have happened by now?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I don't know.  But now that the eclipse is over, I expect we're going to see some firebenders any minute.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: My own invention.  Oh, this is terrible!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: My own invention.  Oh, this is terrible!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: They're back!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: It was all a trap! Azula knew we were coming and she's plotted out every move!  We've just got to get to the beach as fast as we can.  If we can make it to the submarines, maybe we can get away safely.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: It was all a trap! Azula knew we were coming and she's plotted out every move!  We've just got to get to the beach as fast as we can.  If we can make it to the submarines, maybe we can get away safely.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: It was all a trap! Azula knew we were coming and she's plotted out every move!  We've just got to get to the beach as fast as we can.  If we can make it to the submarines, maybe we can get away safely.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: They've got air power, but so do I!  I'm gonna do what I can to slow them down.
scene_description: [Cut to Aang as he opens his glider.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: They've got air power, but so do I!  I'm gonna do what I can to slow them down.
scene_description: [He tosses his glider into the air and takes off, Momo following close behind.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Appa, you and I can help too.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Everyone, let's get back to the subs!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We can't keep them all back! There's too many of them!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Let's join the others!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Uncle!  Where is my uncle?
scene_description: [Zuko sees a big hole in Iroh's cell and sees Warden Poon on the ground; grabs a dazed Poon by the collar.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: He's gone. He busted himself out. I've never seen anything like it, he was like a one-man army!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Try and find cover! I think we're about to see some bombs!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Why aren't they turning around to attack us again?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: They're heading for the beach ...  They're gonna destroy the submarines!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: They're heading for the beach ...  They're gonna destroy the submarines!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: How are we all going to escape?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We're not.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Then our only choice is to stand and fight. We have the Avatar, we could still win.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Yes, with the Avatar we could still win. On another day. You kids have to leave. You have to escape on Appa together.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: What?  We can't leave you behind!  We won't leave anyone behind!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: What?  We can't leave you behind!  We won't leave anyone behind!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: What?  We can't leave you behind!  We won't leave anyone behind!
scene_description: [Looks at the rest of the invasion force.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: You're our only chance in the long run. You and Sokka have to go with Aang somewhere safe.  It's the only way to keep hope alive.
scene_description: [Katara looks back at Aang and Sokka sorrowfully.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: The youngest of our group should go with you. The adults will stay behind and surrender. We'll be prisoners, but we'll all survive this battle.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I've got some experience with the Fire Nation prisons. It's not going to be easy, but we'll get by.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: They're at the beach already!

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Bye, son.
scene_description: [Rising on an earth column along with Toph and helps son mount Appa.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Bye, son.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Bye, Dad. I'm really proud of you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I'll miss you, Pipsqueak.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Take care, The Duke.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We'll be back for you, Dad.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: If we don't escape on our own first.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We lost today, but we've never been this close.  We tasted victory, and that counts for something.
scene_description: [Hands on both Sokka and Katara's shoulders.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We lost today, but we've never been this close.  We tasted victory, and that counts for something.
scene_description: [Kneels down to face his two children.]

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: We'll miss you, Dad.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Bye, Dad. We won't be apart for too long this time. I promise.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Thank you all for being so brave and so strong. I'm gonna make this up to you.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: Should we follow them, princess?

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: No, they're too fast. It doesn't matter. They'll be back.

chapter: The Day of Black Sun, Part 2: The Eclipse
character_words: I know just the place for us to go where we'll be safe for a while. The Western Air Temple!
scene_description: [Looking at the airship in the distance then looks ahead.]

character_words: This is humiliating.
You mean getting thoroughly spanked by the Fire Nation or having to walk all the way to the Western Air Temple?
Both.
Sorry guys, but Appa gets tired carrying all these people.
I wonder how the rest of the troops are.
They're probably on their way to a prison. Seems like my dad just got out and now he's going back in.
I miss Pipsqueak.
I miss not having blisters on my feet.
Hey, we're here! I can feel it!
Uhhh ... I think your feet need their eyes checked.
No, she's right. We are here!
Wow ... it's amazing!
What a stunning view.
The only view I'm interested in seeing is the Avatar in chains.
You know, the Avatar hasn't been seen for one hundred years. The chances of finding him here are very slim.
scene_description: [Cut to a shot of Zuko's bandaged side.]

character_words: First we'll check each of the air temples, then we'll scour the world, searching even the most remote locations until we find him.
Prince Zuko, it's only been a week since your banishment. You should take some time to heal and rest.
What else would I expect to hear from the laziest man in the Fire Nation?  The only way to regain my honor is to find the Avatar, so I will.
It's so different from the Northern Air Temple. I wonder if there are any secret rooms.
Let's go check it out!
You guys go. I think we need to talk about some things.
I'll race you, Duke.
I told you, it's The Duke!
Why can't I go?
We need to decide what we're gonna do now, and since you're the Avatar, maybe you should be a part of this.
Fair enough. So, what's the new plan?
Well, if you ask me, the new plan is the old plan! You just need to master all four elements and confront the Fire Lord before the comet comes.
Oh, yeah. That's great, no problem. I'll just do that.
Aang, no one said it's going to be easy.
Well, it's not even gonna be possible! Where am I supposed to get a firebending teacher?
We could look for Jeong Jeong!
Yeah ... right.  Like we'll ever run into Jeong Jeong again.
Yeah ... right.  Like we'll ever run into Jeong Jeong again.
scene_description: [He lays down on the bench without a care.]

character_words: Who's ... oh,  never mind. If it's important I'll find out.
Who's ... oh,  never mind. If it's important I'll find out.
Oh well, guess we can't come up with anybody. Why don't we just take a nice tour around the temple?
What's up with him?
There's gotta be someone who can teach him firebending.

Hello ...  Zuko here, but I guess  you probably already know me, sort of. Uhhh ... so, the thing is I have a lot of firebending experience, and I'm  considered to be pretty good at it.  Well, you've seen it, you know, when I was attacking you.  Uhhh ... yeah, I guess  I should apologize for that. But anyway,  I'm good now.  I mean, I thought I was good before, but I realize I was bad,  but anyway, I think it's time I joined your group and taught  the Avatar firebending.  Well, what's your answer?  Yeah ... that's what I'd say, too. How am I supposed to convince these people that I'm on their side? What would Uncle do?  Zuko, you have to look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self, reveal itself.  Even when I'm talking for him I can't figure out what he means. What would Azula do?  Listen, Avatar, I can join your group, or I can do something unspeakably horrible to you and your friends. Your choice.  I guess I'm just not that good at impersonations.

character_words: Hello ...  Zuko here, but I guess  you probably already know me, sort of. Uhhh ... so, the thing is I have a lot of firebending experience, and I'm  considered to be pretty good at it.  Well, you've seen it, you know, when I was attacking you.  Uhhh ... yeah, I guess  I should apologize for that. But anyway,  I'm good now.  I mean, I thought I was good before, but I realize I was bad,  but anyway, I think it's time I joined your group and taught  the Avatar firebending.  Well, what's your answer?  Yeah ... that's what I'd say, too. How am I supposed to convince these people that I'm on their side? What would Uncle do?  Zuko, you have to look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self, reveal itself.  Even when I'm talking for him I can't figure out what he means. What would Azula do?  Listen, Avatar, I can join your group, or I can do something unspeakably horrible to you and your friends. Your choice.  I guess I'm just not that good at impersonations.

Yeah ... that's what I'd say, too. How am I supposed to convince these people that I'm on their side? What would Uncle do?  Zuko, you have to look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self, reveal itself.  Even when I'm talking for him I can't figure out what he means. What would Azula do?  Listen, Avatar, I can join your group, or I can do something unspeakably horrible to you and your friends. Your choice.  I guess I'm just not that good at impersonations.
Aang, can we talk about you learning firebending now?
What? The wind is too loud in my ears! Check out this loop!
Aang, I think we should be making some plans about our future!
Okay, we can do that while I show you the giant Pai Sho table! Oh, you're gonna love the all-day echo chamber!
I think that'll have to wait.
scene_description: [Cut to a close up of Toph as she turns serious.]

character_words: Hello ...  Zuko here.
scene_description: [Cut to a close up of Zuko's face.]

character_words: Hello ...  Zuko here.
scene_description: [Raises his arm up in greeting and waves.]

character_words: Hey, I heard you guys flying around down there, so, I just thought I'd wait for you here.  I know you must be surprised to see me here.
scene_description: [Appa growls at him and licks him twice. Cut to a surprised Momo and Aang as he lowers his staff slightly.]

character_words: Not really, since you've followed us all over the world.

Right. Well, uhhh ... anyway ... what I wanted to tell you about is that I've changed, and I, uhhh, I'm good now, and well I think I should join your group, oh, and I can teach firebending to you.  See, I, uhhh ...
You want to what now?
You can't possibly think that any of us would trust you, can you? I mean, how stupid do you think we are?!
Yeah, all you've ever done is hunt us down and try to capture Aang!
I've done some good things! I mean, I could have stolen your bison in Ba Sing Se, but I set him free. That's something!
scene_description: [Appa licks him again, much to his surprise.]

character_words: Appa  does seem to like him.
He probably just covered himself in honey or something so that Appa would lick him. I'm not buying it.
I can understand why you wouldn't trust me, and I know I've made some mistakes in the past.
Like when you attacked our village?
Or when you stole my mother's necklace and used it to track us down and capture us?

Look, I admit I've some awful things. I was wrong to try to capture you, and I'm sorry that I attacked the Water Tribe. And I never should have sent that Fire Nation assassin after you.  I'm going to try and stop-
scene_description: [Toph and Sokka's eyes widen with shock.]

character_words: Wait, you sent Combustion Man after us?
Well, that's not his name, but-
Ohhh, sorry. I didn't mean to insult your friend!
He's not my friend!
That guy locked me and Katara in jail and tried to blow us all up!
Why aren't you saying anything? You once said you thought we could be friends. You know I have good in me.
There's no way we can trust you after everything you've done. We'll never let you join us.
You need to get out of here. Now.
I'm trying to explain that I'm not that person anymore!
Either you leave, or we attack.
If you won't accept me as a friend, then maybe you'll take me as a prisoner.
scene_description: [Zuko kneels down, bends his head, and raises his arms in surrender.]

character_words: No, we won't!  Get out of here, and don't come back! And if we ever see you again, well, we'd better not see you again!
Uggh! I can't believe how stupid I am! I mean, what was I thinking? Telling them I sent an assassin after them? Why didn't I just say Azula did that? They would have believed that! Stupid!  Uggh!
Why would he try to fool us like that?
Obviously he wants to lead us into some kind of trap.
This is just like when we were in prison together at Ba Sing Se. He starts talking about his mother and making it seem like he's an actual human being with feelings.
He wants you to trust and feel sorry for him so you let your guard down, then he strikes.
The thing is, it worked. I did feel sorry for him. I felt like he was really confused and hurt, but obviously, when the time came, he made his choice, and we paid the price. We can't trust him.
I kind of have a confession to make. Remember when you two were sick and I got captured by Zhao?
And you made us suck on frozen frogs? How could I forget? I had a wart on the flap that hangs down from the back of my throat for a month!
Sokka, I looked at it, and I told you, there was nothing there!
I could feel it! It's my throatal flap!
Anyway, when Zhao had me chained up, it was Zuko who came in and got me out. He risked his life to save me.
No way! I'm sure he only did it so he could capture you himself!
Yeah, face it Aang, you're nothing but a big prize to him.
You're probably right.
And what was all that crazy stuff about setting Appa free? What a liar!
Actually, he wasn't lying.
Oh, hooray! In a lifetime of evil, at least he didn't add animal cruelty to the list.
I'm just saying that, considering his messed-up family and how he was raised, he could have turned out a lot worse.
You're right, Toph! Let's go find him and give him a medal. The "not as much of a jerk as you could have been" award!
All I know is that while he was talking to us, he was sincere. Maybe you're all just letting your hurt feelings keep you from thinking clearly.
Easy for you to say! You weren't there when he had us attacked by pirates!
Or when he burned down Kyoshi Island!
Or when he tried to capture me at the Fire Temple!
Why would you even try to defend him?

Because Katara, you're all ignoring one crucial fact:  Aang needs a firebending teacher! We can't think of a single person in the world to do the job! Now one shows up on a silver platter, and you won't even think about it?

Because Katara, you're all ignoring one crucial fact:  Aang needs a firebending teacher! We can't think of a single person in the world to do the job! Now one shows up on a silver platter, and you won't even think about it?

Because Katara, you're all ignoring one crucial fact:  Aang needs a firebending teacher! We can't think of a single person in the world to do the job! Now one shows up on a silver platter, and you won't even think about it?
scene_description: [Stamps her feet on the ground to a point where the ground shakes slightly.]

character_words: I'm not having Zuko as my teacher!
You're darn right you're not, buddy.
Well, I guess that settles that.
Ergh! I'm beginning to wonder who's really the blind one around here!
Who's there? Stay back!
It's me!  Ow! You burned my feet!
scene_description: [Throws up an earth shield, but steps back into Zuko's fire blast.]

character_words: I'm sorry, it was a mistake!
scene_description: [Comes toward her, but she begins to crawl away.]

character_words: Get away from me!
scene_description: [As Toph crawls away, she grabs the earth under her and throws it backward at Zuko.]

character_words: Let me help you!  I'm sorry!
Let me help you!  I'm sorry!
Get off me, get off me!
scene_description: [Brings up some earth which sends Zuko flying back.]

character_words: I didn't know it was you! Uggh, come back!  Uggh! Why am I so bad at being good?
Has anyone seen Toph?
I haven't seen her since she stormed off yesterday.
Maybe she's just exploring the air temple. There are some pretty fun spots to practice earthbending.
I think we should go look for her.
Let her have fun with her rocks. I'm in no rush to have her yelling at us again.
We can go check for her!
Yeah! I want to ride that tunnel down to the Hall of Statues again. It will work a lot better now that I fixed my brakes.
Toph! What happened?
My feet got burned!
Oh no, what happened?
I just told you, my feet got burned!
I meant, how.
Well, I kind of went to see Zuko last night.
You what?
Zuko?
Uhhh ...!
I thought he could be helpful to us.  And if I talked to him, maybe we could work something out.
scene_description: [Katara begins to try and heal her feet.]

character_words: So he attacked you?
Well, he did, and he didn't. It was sort of an accident.
But he did firebend at you?
Yes.
See? You trusted Zuko, and you got burned. Literally!
It's gonna take a while for your feet to get better.  I wish I could have worked on them sooner.
Yeah, me too.
Zuko's clearly too dangerous to be left alone. We're gonna have to go after him.
I hate to go looking for a fight, but you're right. After what he did to Toph, I don't think we have a choice.
He's crafty, but we'll find a way to capture him.
Maybe just invite him back here.  He's already offered himself up as a prisoner once.
scene_description: [Aang and Sokka go to pick her up.]

character_words: Yeah, get him to come back and say he'll be our prisoner, then we'll jump him and really make him our prisoner. He'll never suspect it!
You are a master of surprise, Sokka ...
Ahhh, that's the stuff. Now I know how the rest of you guys feel. Not being able to see with your feet stinks.
scene_description: [Katara sits next to her putting a hand on her shoulder.]

character_words: Stop!  I don't want you hunting the Avatar anymore!  The mission is off. I'm ordering you to stop.
scene_description: [Team Avatar turns their head up to the sound.]

character_words: Stop!  I don't want you hunting the Avatar anymore!  The mission is off. I'm ordering you to stop.
scene_description: [Cut to a quick close up of Aang looking up with shock as he is helping Sokka carry Toph. Cut back to Zuko as he stands in front of Combustion Man, arms spread out to block him.]

character_words: If you keep attacking, I won't pay you!  All right, I'll pay you double to stop!
scene_description: [Attempts to firebend at him, but Combustion Man grabs him.]

character_words: He's going to blast this whole place right off the cliff side!
I can't step out to waterbend at him without being blown up and I can't get a good enough angle on him from down here.
I know how to get an angle on him!  All right buddy, don't fail me now!
scene_description: [Pausing for a moment to think before having an idea.]

character_words: I know how to get an angle on him!  All right buddy, don't fail me now!
scene_description: [Takes out his boomerang. After another blast, he sneaks his head out, but has to hide from another shot. He projects Combustion Man's angle with his boomerang.]

character_words: I know how to get an angle on him!  All right buddy, don't fail me now!
Yeah, boomerang!  Awww, boomerang ...
scene_description: [Jumps up and grabs it, but Combustion Man gets up, albeit clearly shaken.]

character_words: I can't believe I'm saying this, but ... thanks, Zuko.
Hey, what about me? I did the boomerang thing.

Listen, I know I didn't explain myself very well yesterday, I've been through a lot in the last few years, and it's been hard. But I'm realizing that I had to go through all those things to learn the truth. I thought I had lost my honor, and that somehow my father could return it to me. But I know now that no one can give you your honor. It's something you earn for yourself, by choosing to do what's right. All I want to do now is play my part in ending this war, and I know my destiny is to help you restore balance to the world.  I'm sorry for what I did to you.  It was an accident. Fire can be dangerous and wild, so as a firebender, I need to be more careful and control my bending, so I don't hurt people unintentionally.

Listen, I know I didn't explain myself very well yesterday, I've been through a lot in the last few years, and it's been hard. But I'm realizing that I had to go through all those things to learn the truth. I thought I had lost my honor, and that somehow my father could return it to me. But I know now that no one can give you your honor. It's something you earn for yourself, by choosing to do what's right. All I want to do now is play my part in ending this war, and I know my destiny is to help you restore balance to the world.  I'm sorry for what I did to you.  It was an accident. Fire can be dangerous and wild, so as a firebender, I need to be more careful and control my bending, so I don't hurt people unintentionally.

I think you are supposed to be my firebending teacher. When I first tried to learn firebending, I burned Katara, and after that, I never wanted to firebend again. But now I know you understand how easy it is to hurt the people you love. I'd like you to teach me.
scene_description: [Looks at Zuko shocked, hearing these words, and thinks for a moment.]

character_words: I think you are supposed to be my firebending teacher. When I first tried to learn firebending, I burned Katara, and after that, I never wanted to firebend again. But now I know you understand how easy it is to hurt the people you love. I'd like you to teach me.
Thank you. I'm so happy you've accepted me into your group.
Not so fast. I still have to ask my friends if it's okay with them.  Toph, you're the one that Zuko burned. What do you think?
Go ahead and let him join.  It'll give me plenty of time to get back at him for burning my feet.
scene_description: [Pounds her fist into her palm jokingly.]

character_words: Sokka?
Hey, all I want is to defeat the Fire Lord. If you think this is the way to do it, then, I'm all for it.
Katara?
I'll go along with whatever you think is right.
scene_description: [Glares at Zuko for a moment and Zuko starts to sweat; reluctantly.]

character_words: I'll go along with whatever you think is right.
I won't let you down! I promise!
So, here you go, home sweet home, I guess, you know, for now. Unpack? Lunch, soon? Uhhh ... welcome aboard?  Yeah.  Okay, this is really, really weird.
scene_description: [Zuko glances back and smiles at him.]

character_words: So, here you go, home sweet home, I guess, you know, for now. Unpack? Lunch, soon? Uhhh ... welcome aboard?  Yeah.  Okay, this is really, really weird.
scene_description: [Walks out of the room and meets Aang in the hallway; to Aang.]

character_words: If I have to, I will spend every day of the rest of my life hunting the Avatar. I know it's my destiny to capture him.
You know Prince Zuko, destiny is a funny thing. You never know how things are going to work out. But if you keep an open mind, and an open heart, I promise you will find your own destiny someday.

You might have everyone else here buying your ... transformation, but you and I both know you've struggled with doing the right thing in the past.  So let me tell you something, right now. You make one step backward,  one slip-up, give me one reason to think you might hurt Aang, and you won't have to worry about your destiny anymore.  Because I'll make sure your destiny ends ... right then and there. Permanently.

You might have everyone else here buying your ... transformation, but you and I both know you've struggled with doing the right thing in the past.  So let me tell you something, right now. You make one step backward,  one slip-up, give me one reason to think you might hurt Aang, and you won't have to worry about your destiny anymore.  Because I'll make sure your destiny ends ... right then and there. Permanently.

You might have everyone else here buying your ... transformation, but you and I both know you've struggled with doing the right thing in the past.  So let me tell you something, right now. You make one step backward,  one slip-up, give me one reason to think you might hurt Aang, and you won't have to worry about your destiny anymore.  Because I'll make sure your destiny ends ... right then and there. Permanently.
I know you're nervous, but remember, firebending in it of itself is not something to fear.
Okay. Not something to fear.
scene_description: [Cut to Aang, as he sighs heavily.]

character_words: But if you don't respect it,  it'll chew you up and spit you out like an angry komodo rhino!
But if you don't respect it,  it'll chew you up and spit you out like an angry komodo rhino!
scene_description: [He raises his voice, as the camera zooms to a close-up of his face.]

character_words: Now show me what you've got. Any amount of fire you can make.
Maybe I need a little more instruction. Perhaps a demonstration?
Good idea. You might wanna take a couple steps back.
scene_description: [Cut to an aerial shot of the both.]

character_words: What was that? That was the worst firebending I've ever seen!
I thought it was ... nice.
I thought it was ... nice.
Why is this happening?
Maybe it's the altitude.
Yeah, could be.
Just breathe, and ...
scene_description: [He delivers another blast with no improvement.]

character_words: That one kind of felt hot.
Don't patronize me! You know what it's supposed to look like!
Sorry, Sifu Hotman.
And stop calling me that!
scene_description: [Raises his arms to his head, and throws them down back, and shouts in frustration, as Aang cringes.]

character_words: Hey, jerks! Mind if I watch you two jerks do your jerkbending?
Get out of here!
Get out of here!
scene_description: [He lashes his arm and points to a side.]

character_words: Okay, take it easy.  I was just kiddin' around.  Jerkbending, still got it.
Okay, take it easy.  I was just kiddin' around.  Jerkbending, still got it.
scene_description: [He gets up and turns around, laughing as he adjusts his shirt.]

character_words: Okay, take it easy.  I was just kiddin' around.  Jerkbending, still got it.
scene_description: [Zuko drops his head, dejected, and moans.]

character_words: Listen everybody, I've got some pretty bad news. I've lost my stuff.
Don't look at me,  I didn't touch your stuff.
Don't look at me,  I didn't touch your stuff.
I'm talking about my firebending. It's gone.
I'm sorry. I'm just laughing at the irony. You know, how it would've been nice for us if you lost your firebending a long time ago.
Well, it's not lost. It's just ... weaker for some reason.
scene_description: [Camera zooms back to show everyone sitting around the campfire and Zuko standing.]

character_words: Maybe you're not as good as you think you are.
scene_description: [Holding up her bowl and glaring at Zuko.]

character_words: Ouch.
Ouch.
I bet it's because I changed sides.
That's ridiculous.
That's ridiculous.
I don't know. Maybe it isn't. Maybe your firebending comes from rage and you just don't have enough anger to fuel it the way you used to.
Sooo, all we need to do is make Zuko angry. Easy enough.
scene_description: [Leans toward Zuko and points a finger above.]

character_words: Okay, cut it out!  Look, even if you're right, I don't want to rely on hate and anger anymore. There has to be another way.
scene_description: [Sokka stops poking, as his sword slips from his hands and is thrown above, before falling on his head. Zuko rubs his nose.]

character_words: You're gonna need to learn to draw your firebending from a different source. I recommend the original source.
scene_description: [Cut to Toph, as Sokka sits near her, and rubs his head.]

character_words: You're gonna need to learn to draw your firebending from a different source. I recommend the original source.
How's he supposed to do that‌? By jumping into a volcano‌?
No. Zuko needs to go back to whatever the original source of firebending is.
So, is it jumping into a volcano?
I don't know.  For earthbending, the original benders were badgermoles.
scene_description: [Places her bowl down as the shot cuts to a close-up of her face.]

character_words: One day, when I was little, I ran away and hid in a cave.
That's where I met them.

They were blind, just like me.  So we understood each other. I was able to learn earthbending,  not just as a martial art, but as an extension of my senses.  For them, the original earthbenders,  it wasn't just about fighting. It was their way of interacting with the world.
scene_description: [The badgermole walks away as Toph attempts to crawls after it.]

character_words: They were blind, just like me.  So we understood each other. I was able to learn earthbending,  not just as a martial art, but as an extension of my senses.  For them, the original earthbenders,  it wasn't just about fighting. It was their way of interacting with the world.
scene_description: [Cut to an overhead shot of the badgermole, which moves its paws in a sweeping motion.]

character_words: They were blind, just like me.  So we understood each other. I was able to learn earthbending,  not just as a martial art, but as an extension of my senses.  For them, the original earthbenders,  it wasn't just about fighting. It was their way of interacting with the world.
scene_description: [Screen fades to an overhead shot of Toph mimicking the creature's actions.]

character_words: They were blind, just like me.  So we understood each other. I was able to learn earthbending,  not just as a martial art, but as an extension of my senses.  For them, the original earthbenders,  it wasn't just about fighting. It was their way of interacting with the world.
scene_description: [The badgermole comes across a pile of rocks and earthbends them to the side.]

character_words: They were blind, just like me.  So we understood each other. I was able to learn earthbending,  not just as a martial art, but as an extension of my senses.  For them, the original earthbenders,  it wasn't just about fighting. It was their way of interacting with the world.
scene_description: [She stops crawling and stands up. She earthbends a stone and smiles at her success.]

character_words: That's amazing, Toph!
I learned from the monks, but the original airbenders were the sky bison.  Maybe you can give me a lesson sometime, buddy.
scene_description: [Cut to an aerial shot of the group.]

character_words: I learned from the monks, but the original airbenders were the sky bison.  Maybe you can give me a lesson sometime, buddy.
scene_description: [Camera pans above to show a mural of three sky bison. Aang leans back to look at Appa.]

character_words: Well, this doesn't help me. The original firebenders were the dragons, and they're extinct.
What do you mean‌? Roku had a dragon, and there were plenty of dragons when I was a kid.
scene_description: [Shot cuts to behind Zuko as he looks at the group.]

character_words: Well, they aren't around anymore, okay?
scene_description: [Cut to Zuko's face, as he yells.]

character_words: Okay, okay.  I'm sorry.
scene_description: [Moves his arms in an appeasing manner.]

character_words: But maybe there's another way.  The first people to learn from the dragons were the ancient Sun Warriors.
Sun Warriors? Well, I know they weren't around when I was a kid.
No, they died off thousands of years ago. But their civilization wasn't too far from where we are now.  Maybe we can learn something by poking around their ruins.
No, they died off thousands of years ago. But their civilization wasn't too far from where we are now.  Maybe we can learn something by poking around their ruins.
scene_description: [Cut to a shot of the two from the side, as Zuko turns his head toward the Avatar.]

character_words: It's like the monks used to tell me. Sometimes, the shadows of the past can be felt by the present.
So, what?  Maybe you'll pick up some super old Sun Warrior energy just by standing  where they stood a thousand years ago?
scene_description: [Aang and Zuko look back at him and the shot cuts to Sokka seated.]

character_words: So, what?  Maybe you'll pick up some super old Sun Warrior energy just by standing  where they stood a thousand years ago?
scene_description: [Moves his hand in a strange motion.]

character_words: More or less. Either I find a new way to firebend,  or the Avatar has to find a new teacher.
